verses.padam: (Padam) vAyavya̱m|śvEtam|Eti|laBEta|BUti̍kAma̍ iti BUti-kAmaḥ|vAyuḥ|vai|kṣEpi̍ṣṭhA|dEvatA̱|vAyum|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|Enam|BUti̱m|gamayati|Bava̍ti|Eva|ati̍kṣiprEtyati̍# - kṣiprA|dEvatA̱|iti|Ahuḥ|sA|Enam|IśvarA|pradaha̍ iti# pra-dahaḥ|iti̍|Etam|Eva|santa̱m|vAyavE̱|niyutva̍ta̍ iti# ni-yutvatE|Eti̍|laBEta|niyuditi̍# ni - yut|vai|asya|dhRutiḥ|dhRutaḥ|Eva|BUti̱m|upEti̍|Eti|apra̍dAhAyEtyapra̍# - dAhAya|Bavati|Eva|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAyavyaṅ# śvEtamA laBEta̍ BUtikAmo̍ vAyurvai kṣEpiṣṭhA̍ dEvatAvAyumEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvainaM BUtiM̍ gamayatiBavatyEvA-ti̍kṣiprA̍ dEvatEtyAhuḥ̍ sainamIśvarA̍ pradaha ityEtamEva santaM̍ ~MvAyavE# niyutvata̍ A laBEta̍ niyudvA asya̍ dhRutirddhRuta̍ Eva BUtimupaitya pradAhAya̍ BavatyEva̍ - [ ] 1

verses.padam: (Padam) vAyavE̱|niyutvata̍ iti# ni - yutvatE|Eti̍|laBEta|grAma̍kAma̍ iti grAma# - kAmaḥ|vAyuḥ|vai|imAḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|nasyOtA iti# nasi - OtAḥ|nEnIyatE|vAyum|Eva|niyutvantamiti̍# ni-yutvantam|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|nasyOtA iti# nasi - OtAḥ|nIti|yacCati|grAmI|Eva|Bavati|niyutva̍ta̍ iti# ni-yutvatE|Bavati|dhruvAḥ|Eva|asmai|ana̍pagA̍ ityanapa̍ - gAḥ|karOti|vAyavE̱|niyutvata̍ iti# ni - yutvatE|Eti̍|laBEta|prajAkA̍ma̍ iti# prajA - kAmaḥ|prAṇa iti# pra- anaḥ|vai|vAyuḥ|apAna ityapa̍ - anaḥ|niyuditi# ni - yut|prAṇApAnAviti# prAṇa- apAnau|Kalu|vai|Etasya̍|prajAyA̍ iti# pra - jAyA̱ḥ|2 (50)
verses.samhita: vAyavE# niyutvata̍ A laBEta̍ grAmakAmO̍ vAyurvA imAḥ prajA nasyOtA̍ nEnIyatE̍ vAyumEva niyutvantaṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai̱ prajA nasyOtA̍ niyacCati̍ grAmyEva̍ Bavati̍ niyutvatE̍ Bavati dhruvA EvAsmA anapagAḥ̍ karOti vAyavE# niyutvata̍ A laBEta̍ prajAkAmaḥ̍ prAṇO vai vAyurapAnO̍ niyut prAṇApAnau̍ Kalu vA Etasya# prajAyA- [ ] 2

verses.padam: (Padam) apEti|krAmataḥ|yaḥ|ala̱m|prajAyA̍ iti# pra - jAyai̱|sann|prajAmiti# pra -jAm|na|vindatE̱|vAyum|Eva|niyutvantamiti̍# ni - yutvantam|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|prAṇApAnAByAmiti̍# prAṇa - apAnAByA̱m|prajAmiti# pra -jAm|prEti|janayati|vindatE̱|prajAmiti̍# pra -jAm|vAyavE̱|niyutvata̍ iti# ni-yutvatE|Eti̍|laBEta|jyOgA̍mayAvIti̍ jyOk - AmayAvI|prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|vai|vAyuḥ|apAna ityapa̍ - anaḥ|niyuditi# ni - yut|prAṇApAnAviti# prAṇa-apAnau|Kalu|vai|EtasmA̱t|apEti̍|krAmataḥ|yasya̍|jyOk|Amaya̍ti|vAyum|Eva|niyutva̍ntamiti̍# ni - yutvantam|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: apa# krAmatO yO&laM̍ prajAyai san prajAM na vindatE# vAyumEva niyutvantaṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai̱ prAṇApAnAByA̱M prajAM pra janayati̍ vindatE̱ prajAM ~MvAyavE# niyutvata̍ A laBEta̍ jyOgAmayAvI̍ prAṇO vai vAyurapAnO̍ niyut prAṇApAnau̍ Kalu vA EtasmA dapakrAmatO̍ yasya jyOgAmayati̍ vAyumEva niyutvantaṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# - [ ] 3

verses.padam: (Padam) dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asminn|prAṇApAnAviti# prAṇa - apAnau|dadhAti|uta|yadi|itAsuritIta-asuḥ|Bava̍ti|jIva̍ti|Eva|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vai|idam|Ekaḥ|AsIt|saḥ|akAmayata|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|paśUn|sRujEya|iti|saḥ|Atmana̍ḥ|vapAm|uditi̍|akKidat|tAm|agnau|prEti̍|agRuhṇAt|tata̍ḥ|ajaḥ|tUparaḥ|samiti̍|aBavat|tam|svAyai̱|dEvatA̍yai|Eti̍|alaBata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|paśUn|asRujata|yaḥ|prajAkAma̍ iti# prajA - kAmaḥ|4 (50)
verses.samhita: dhAvati sa EvAsmin̍ prAṇApAnau dadhAtyuta̍ yadItAsurBavati̍ jIvatyEva̍ prajApatirvA̍ idamEka# AsIth sO&kAmayata̍ prajAḥ paśUnth sRujEyEti̍ sa AtmanO# vapAmudakKidat̍ tAmagnau prAgRuhṇAt̍ tatO&jastUparaḥ̍ samaBavat̍ taṅ svAyai# dEvatAyA̍ A &laBata̍ tatO vai sa prajAḥ paśUnasRujata̍ yaḥ prajAkAmaḥ̍ - [ ] 4

verses.padam: (Padam) paśukAma̍ iti# paśu - kAmaḥ|syAt|saḥ|Etam|prAjApatyamiti# prAjA - patyam|ajam|tUparam|Eti|laBEta|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|paśUn|prEti|janayati|yat|śmaśruṇaḥ|tat|puru̍ṣAṇAm|rUpam|yat|tUparaḥ|tat|aśvA̍nAm|yat|anyatO̍dannityanyata̍ḥ̍ - dann|tat|gavA̱m|yat|avyA̱ḥ|iva|śaPAḥ|tat|avInAm|yat|ajaḥ|tat|ajAnA̱m|EtAva̍ntaḥ|vai|grAmyAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|tAn|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: paśukAmaḥ̍ syAth sa EtaM prAjApatyamajaM̍ tUparamA̍ laBEta̍ prajApatimEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai̱ prajAM paśUn prajanayati̍ yacC^^maśruṇastat̍ puruṣAṇAṃ̍ rUpaM ~Myat tUparastadaśvA̍nAM̍ ~MyadanyatOdan̍ tad-gavAM ~MyadavyA# iva śaPAstadavInAM̍ ~Myadajasta-dajAnA-mEtAva̍ntO̍ vai grAmyAḥ paśavastAn - [ ] 5

verses.padam: (Padam) rUpEṇa|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|sOmApauṣṇamiti̍# sOmA - pauṣṇam|traitam|Eti|laBEta|paśukA̍ma̍ iti# paśu - kAmaḥ|dvau|vai|ajAyai̱|stanau̱|nAnA̱|Eva|dvau|aBIti|jAyE̍tE̍ iti|Urja̱m|puṣṭi̱m|tRutIya̍ḥ|sOmApUṣaṇAviti̍# sOmA - pUṣaṇau̱|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tau|Eva|asmai|paśUn|prEti̍|janayataḥ|sOma̍ḥ|vai|rEtOdhA̍ iti# rEtaḥ - dhAḥ|pUṣA|paśUnAm|prajanayitEti# pra-janayitA|sOmaḥ|Eva|asmai|rEta̍ḥ|dadhA̍ti|pUṣA|paśUn|prEti̍|janayati|audu̍mbaraḥ|yUpa̍ḥ̍ ( )|Bavati|Urk|vai|udumbaraḥ|Urk|paśava̍ḥ|UrjA|Eva|asmai|Urja̱m|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE||6̍ (63) (apradAhAya̍ BavatyEva̍ - prajAyA# - Amayati̍ vAyumEva niyutvataṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# - prajAkama̍ - stAn - yUpa - strayOdaśa̍ ca ) (A1)
verses.samhita: rUpEṇaivAva# rundhE sOmApauṣṇaM traitamA laBEta̍ paśukAmOdvau̍ vA ajAyai stanau nAnaiva dvAvaBi jAyEtE̍ UrjaM puṣṭiM̍ tRutIyaḥsOmApUṣaṇA̍vEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tAvEvAsmai# paśUn prajanayataḥ̍ sOmO vai rEtOdhAḥ̍ pUṣA paśUnAM̍ prajanayitA̍ sOma# EvAsmai rEtO dadhAti̍ pUṣA paśUn pra janayatyaudu̍mbarO̍ yUpO# ( ) BavatyUrgvA udumbara̍ Urk paśava# UrjaivAsmA UrjaM̍ paśUnava# rundhE||6

verses.padam: (Padam) prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|asRujata|tAḥ|asmAt|sRuṣṭAḥ|parAcIḥ|Ayann|tAḥ|varu̍ṇam|agacCann|tAḥ|anviti̍|ait|tAḥ|puna̍ḥ|ayAcata|tAḥ|asmai|na|puna̍ḥ|adadAt|saḥ|abravIt|vara̱m|vRuṇIṣva|atha̍|mE|puna̍ḥ|dEhi|iti̍|tAsA̱m|vara̱m|Eti̍|alaBata|saḥ|kRuṣṇaḥ|Eka̍śitipAdityEka̍# - śitipAt|aBavat|yaḥ|varuṇagRuhIta̍ iti varuṇa̍ - gRuhItaḥ|syAt|saḥ|Etam|vAruṇam|kRuṣṇam|EkaśitipAdamityEka̍# - śitipAdam|Eti|laBEta|varu̍ṇam|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ tA asmAth̍ sRuṣṭAḥ parAcIrAyan̍ tA varuṇamagacCan̍ tA anvait tAḥ punarayAcata̍ tA asmai̍ na punaradadAth̍ sO̱&bravId-varaM̍ ~MvRuṇIṣvAtha# mE punardEhIti̍ tAsAM ~MvaramA &laBata̍ sa kRuṣṇa EkaśitipAda-BavadyO̍ varuṇa̍ gRuhItaḥ syAth sa EtaM ~MvAruṇaM̍ kRuṣṇa-mEkaśitipAdamA-la̍BEta̍ varuṇa̍ - [ ] 7

verses.padam: (Padam) Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|Enam|varuṇapAśAditi̍# varuṇa - pAśAt|mu~jcati|kRuṣṇaḥ|EkaśitipAdityEka̍# - śitipAt|Bavati|vAruṇaḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|dEvatayA|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti sam - Ruddhayai|suvarBAnuriti̍ suvaḥ̍ - BAnuḥ|Asuraḥ|sUrya̱m|tamasA|aviddhyat|tasmai̱|dEvAḥ|prAya̍ścittim|aicCann|tasya̍|yat|prathamam|tama̍ḥ|apAGnannitya̍pa̍ - aGnann|sA|kRuṣṇA|avi̍ḥ|aBavat|yat|dvitIya̱m|sA|Palgu̍nI|yat|tRutIya̱m|sA|balakṣI|yat|addhyasthAditya̍dhi̍ - asthAt|apAkRuntannitya̍pa̍ - akRuntann|sA|avi̍ḥ|vaśA|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mEva svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvainaM̍ ~MvaruṇapAśAn mu~jcati̍ kRuṣṇa EkaśitipAd-Bavati̍ vAruṇO hyEṣa̍ dEvatayA̍ samRuddhyai̍ suvarBAnurAsuraḥ̍ sUryaM tamasA&viddhyata̍ tasmaidEvAḥ̍ prAyaścitti-maicCan̍ tasya yat prathamaM̍ tamO&pAGnanth^^sA kRuṣṇA&viraBavad-yad̍ dvitIyaṃq sA PalgunI̍ yata tRutIyaṃq sA balakṣI̍ yadaddhyasthA-dapAkRu̍ntanth^^sA̍ &virvaśA̍ - [ ] 8

verses.padam: (Padam) samiti|aBavat|tE|dEvAḥ|abruvann|dEvapaśuriti̍# dEva-paśuḥ|vai|ayam|samiti|aBUt|kasmai̱|imam|Eti̍|laPsyAmahE|iti̍|atha̍|vai|taṛhi̍|alpA̱|pRuthivI|AsI̱t|ajA̍tAḥ|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|tAm|avi̱m|vaśAm|AdityEBya̍ḥ|kAmA̍ya|Eti̍|alaBanta|tata̍ḥ|vai|apra̍thata|pRuthivI|ajA̍yanta|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|yaḥ|kAmayE̍ta|prathE̍ya|paśuBiriti̍# paśu - Biḥ|prEti|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|jAyEya|iti|saḥ|EtAm|avi̱m|vaśAm|AdityEBya̍ḥ|kAmA̍ya|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: samaBavat̍ tE dEvA abruvan̍ dEvapaśurvA ayaṃ samaBUt̍ kasmA# imamA laPsyAmaha̍ ityatha vai tarhyalpA# pRuthivyAsI-dajAtA̍ OṣadhayastAmavi̍M̍ ~MvaśAmAdityEByaḥ̍ kAmAyA&laBanta̍ tatO vA aprathata̍ pRuthivya-jAyantauṣa̍dhayO̍ yaḥ kAmayEta̍ prathEya̍ paśuBiḥ pra prajayA# jAyEyEti sa EtAmaviM̍ ~MvaśAmAdityEByaḥ̍ kAmAyA - [ ] 9

verses.padam: (Padam) Eti|laBEta|AdityAn|Eva|kAma̱m|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tE|Eva|Enam|prathaya̍nti|paśuBiriti̍# paśu - Biḥ|prEti|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|janayanti|asau|Adityaḥ|na|vIti|arOcata|tasmai̱|dEvAḥ|prAya̍ścittim|aicCann|tasmai̱|EtAḥ|malqḥAḥ|Eti̍|alaBanta|AgnEyIm|kRuṣṇagrIvImiti̍# kRuṣṇa - grIvIm|saṃqhitAmiti# saM - hitAm|aindrIm|śvEtAm|bAṛqhaspatyAm|tABiḥ|Eva|asminn|ruca̱m|adadhuḥ|yaḥ|brahmavarcasakA̍ma̍ iti# brahmavarcasa - kAmaḥ|syAt|tasmai̱|EtAḥ|malqḥAḥ|Eti|laBEta|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: &&*laBEtA̍ &&*dityAnEva kAmaṅq svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati ta EvainaM̍ prathayanti̍ paśuBiḥ pra prajayA# janayantya-sAvAdityO̍ na vyarOcata̍ tasmai# dEvAḥ prAyaścittimaicCan̍ tasmA# EtA malqḥA AlaBantA&&*gnEyIM̍ kRuṣṇagrIvIṃ̍ saṃhitAmaindrIṅ̍ śvEtAM bAṛhaspatyAM̍ tABirEvAsmin̍ rucamadadhuryO̍ brahmavarcasa-kA̍maḥ̍ syAt tasmA# EtA maqlqḥA A laBEtA̍ - [ ] 10

verses.padam: (Padam) AgnEyIm|kRuṣṇagrIvImiti# kRuṣṇa - grIvIm|saṃqhitAmiti# saM - hitAm|aindrIm|śvEtAm|bAṛqhaspatyAm|EtAḥ|Eva|dEvatA̱ḥ|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tAḥ|Eva|asminn|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|dadhati|brahmavarcasIti# brahma - varcasI|Eva|Bavati|vasantA̱|prAtaḥ|AgnEyIm|kRuṣṇagrIvImiti# kRuṣṇa - grIvIm|Eti|laBEta|grIṣmE|maddhyandi̍nE|saṃqhitAmiti̍# saM - hitAm|aindrIm|śaradi|aparAhṇa̍ ityapara̍ - ahnE|śvEtAm|bAṛqhaspatyAm|trIṇi|vai|Adityasya̍|tEjAṃ̍si|vasantA̱|prAtaḥ|grIṣmE|maddhyandi̍nE|śaradi̍|aparAhṇa̍ ityapara̍ - ahnE|yAvanti|Eva|tEjAṃ̍si|tAni̍|Eva|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: &&*gnEyIM kRuṣṇagrIvIṃ̍ saṃhitAmaindrIṅ̍ śvEtAM bAṛhaspatyAmEtA̍ Eva dEvatAḥ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tA EvAsmin̍ brahmavarcasaM dadhati̍ brahmavarcasyEva̍ Bavati̍ vasantA̱ prAtarA̱gnEyIM kRuṣṇa̍ grIvImA laBEta̍ grIṣmE maddhyandinE̍ saṃhitAmaindrIṃ śaradyaparAhṇE̍ śvEtAM bAṛhaspatyAM̍ trIṇi vA Adityasya̍ tEjAṃsi̍ vasantA̱ prAtargrIṣmE maddhyandinE̍ śaradyaparAhṇE̍ yAvantyEva̍ tEjAṃsi̍ tAnyEvA - [ ] 11

verses.padam: (Padam) avEti|rundhE|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|paryAlaByanta̍ iti# pari - AlaByantE|saMq~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM-vathsaraḥ|vai|brahmavarcasasyEti# brahma - varcasasya|pradAtEti̍# pra - dAtA|saMq~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|Eva|asmai|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|prEti|yacCati|brahmavarcasIti̍# brahma - varcasI|Eva|Bavati|garBiṇayaḥ|Bavanti|indriyam|vai|garBa̍ḥ|indriyam|Eva|asminn|dadhati|sArasvatIm|mEṣIm|Eti̍|laBEta|yaḥ|Iśvaraḥ|vAcaḥ|vadi̍tOḥ|sann|vAca̱m|na|vadE̱t|vAk|vai|sara̍svatI|sara̍svatIm|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|sA|Eva|asminn|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -va# rundhE saM~MvathsaraM paryAlaByantE̍ saM~MvathsarO vai brahmavarcasasya̍# pradAtA saM~Mvathsara̍ EvAsmai̱ brahmavarcasaM pra yacCati̍ brahmavarcasyEva̍ Bavati̍ garBiṇayO̍ BavantIndriyaM ~Mvai garBa# indriyamEvAsmin̍ dadhati sArasvatIM mEṣImA laBEta̍ ya I̱śvarO vAcO vaditOḥ̍ san vAcaM na vadEd-vAgvai sarasvatI̍ sarasvatImEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati saivAsmin- [ ] 12

verses.padam: (Padam) vAca̱m|dadhAti|pravaditEti# pra - vaditA|vAcaḥ|Bavati|apannadatItyapa̍nna̍ - datI|Bavati|tasmA̱t|manuṣyA̱ḥ|sarvA̱m|vAca̱m|vadanti|AgnEyam|kRuṣṇagrIvamiti̍# kRuṣṇa-grIvam|Eti|laBEta|saumyam|baBrum|jyOgA̍mayAvIti̍ jyOk - AmayAvI|agnim|vai|Etasya|śarI̍ram|gacCati|sOma̱m|rasa̍ḥ|yasya̍|jyOk|Amaya̍ti|agnEḥ|Eva|asya|śarI̍ram|niṣkrIṇAtIti̍# niḥ - krIṇAti|sOmA̱t|rasa̱m|uta|yadi̍|itAsuritIta̍ - asuḥ|Bavati|jIva̍ti|Eva|saumyam|baBrum|Eti̍|laBEta|AgnEyam|kRuṣṇagrI̍vamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - grIvam|prajAkAma̍ iti# prajA - kAmaḥ|sOmaḥ|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAcaM̍ dadhAti pravaditA vAcO Bavatyapa̍nnadatI̍ Bavati tasmA̱n manuṣyA̱ḥ sarvAM ~MvAcaM̍ ~MvadantyAgnEyaM kRuṣṇagrIvamA̍ laBEta̍ saumyaM baBruM jyOgAmayAvyagniM̍ ~MvA Etasya śarIraM̍ gacCati sOmaṃq rasO yasya jyOgAmayatyagnErEvAsya̍ śarIraM̍ niṣkrIṇAti sOmAd rasamuta̍ yadItAsurBavati̍ jIvatyEva̍ saumyaM baBrumA laBEtA&&*gnEyaM̍ kRuṣṇagrIvaM̍ prajAkAmaḥ̍ sOmO - [ ] 13

verses.padam: (Padam) vai|rEtOdhA iti# rEtaḥ - dhAḥ|agniḥ|prajAnAmiti# pra - jAnA̱m|prajanayitEti# pra-janayitA|sOmaḥ|Eva|asmai|rEta̍ḥ|dadhA̍ti|agniḥ|prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|prEti|janayati|vindatE̱|prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|AgnEyam|kRuṣṇagrIvamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - grIvam|Eti|laBEta|saumyam|baBrum|yaḥ|brAhmaṇaḥ|vidyAm|anUcyEtya̍nu̍ - ucya|na|virOcEtEti̍# vi - rOcEta|yat|AgnEyaḥ|Bava̍ti|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|tEna̍|dadhAti|yat|saumyaḥ|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|tEna|kRuṣṇagrI̍va̍ iti# kRuṣṇa - grIvaḥ|AgnEyaḥ|Bavati|tamaḥ|Eva|asmAt|apEti̍|hanti|śvEtaḥ|Bavati|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vai rEtOdhA̍ agniḥ prajAnA̱M prajanayitA sOma# EvAsmai rEtO dadhA̱tyagniḥ prajAM prajanayati̍ vindatE̱ prajAmA̱gnEyaM kRuṣṇagrIvamA̍ laBEta̍ saumyaM baBruM ~MyO brA̱hmaṇO vidyAmanUcya na virOcEta̍ yadA̱gnEyO Bavati̍ tEja# EvAsmin tEna# dadhAti yath saumyO brahmavarcasaM̍ tEna# kRuṣṇagrIva̍ AgnEyO Bavati̍ tama# EvAsmAdapa# hanti śvEtO Bavati̍ - [ ] 14

verses.padam: (Padam) ruca̱m|Eva|asminn|dadhAti|baBruḥ|saumyaḥ|Bavati|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|Eva|asminn|tviṣi̱m|dadhAti|AgnEyam|kRuṣṇagrIvamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - grIvam|Eti|laBEta|saumyam|baBrum|AgnEyam|kRuṣṇagrI̍vamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - grIvam|purOdhAyAmiti# puraḥ - dhAyA̱m|sparddhamAnaḥ|AgnEyaḥ|vai|brAhmaṇaḥ|saumyaḥ|rAjanya̍ḥ|aBita̍ḥ|saumyam|AgnEyau|Bavataḥ|tEja̍sA|Eva|brahma̍ṇA|uBayata̍ḥ|rAṣṭram|parIti̍|gRuhṇAti|EkadhEtyE̍ka̍ - dhA|samAvRu~gkta̍ iti# saM - AvRu~gktE|puraḥ|Enam|dadhatE||15̍ (43) (laBEta varuṇaM̍ - ~Mvaśai - tAmaviM̍ ~MvaśAmAdityEByaḥ̍ kAmAya̍ - malhA A laBEta̍ - tAnyEva - saivAsminth - sOmaḥ̍ - svEtO Bavati̍ - tricatvAriṃśacca̍ ) (A2)
verses.samhita: rucamEvAsmi̍n̍ dadhAti baBruḥ saumyO Bavati̍ brahmavarcasamEvAsmin tviṣiM̍ dadhAtyA-gnEyaM kRuṣṇagrIvamA̍ laBEta̍ saumyaM baBrumA̱gnEyaM kRuṣṇagrIvaM̍ purOdhAyAṅq sparddhamAna̍ AgnEyO vai brA̱hmaṇaḥ saumyO rAjanyO̍&Bita̍ḥ̍ saumyamA̱gnEyau Bavata-stEja̍saiva̍ brahmaṇOBayatO̍# rAṣṭraM pari# gRuhṇAtyEkadhA samA vRu~gktE̍ pura EnaM̍ dadhatE||15

verses.padam: (Padam) dEvAsurA iti# dEva - asurAḥ|Eṣu|lOkEṣu|asparddhanta|saḥ|Etam|viṣṇu̍ḥ|vAmanam|apaśyat|tam|svAyai̱|dEvatA̍yai|Eti̍|alaBata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|imAn|lOkAn|aBIti̍|ajayat|vaiṣṇavam|vAmanam|Eti̍|laBEta|sparddha̍mAnaḥ|viṣṇu̍ḥ|Eva|BUtvA|imAn|lOkAn|aBIti̍|jayati|viṣa̍ma̍ iti vi - samE|Eti|laBEta|viṣa̍mA̍ iti vi - samAḥ|iva|hi|imE|lOkAḥ|samRuddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|indrAya|manyumata̍ iti# manyu - matE̱|manasvatE|lalAma̱m|prAśRu~ggam|Eti̍|laBEta|sa~ggrAma̍ iti# saM - grAmE|16 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAsurA Eṣu lOkEṣvasparddhanta̍ sa EtaM ~Mviṣṇu-rvAmanama̍paśyat̍ taṅ svAyai# dEvatAyA̍ A&laBata̍ tatO vai sa imAM ~MlOkAnaByajayad-̍ vaiṣṇavaM ~MvAmanamA̍ laBEta̍ sparddhamAnO̍ viṣṇurEva̍ BUtvEmAn ~MlOkAnaBi jayati̍ viṣama̍ A laBEta̍ viṣamA̍ iva hImE lOkAḥ samRuddhyA̍ indrAya̍ manyumatE manasvatE̍ lalAmaM̍ prAśRu~ggamA laBEta̍ saMgrAmE - [ ] 16

verses.padam: (Padam) saM~Myatta̍ iti saM - yattE|indriyEṇa|vai|manyunA̱|mana̍sA|sa~ggrAmamiti̍# saM - grAmam|jayati|indra̱m|Eva|manyumantamiti# manyu - manta̱m|manasvantam|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asminn|indriyam|manyum|mana̍ḥ|dadhAti|jaya̍ti|tam|sa~ggrAmamiti̍# saM - grAmam|indrAya|marutva̍tE|pRuśnisakthamiti̍# pRuśni - saktham|Eti|laBEta|grAma̍kAma̍ iti grAma# - kAmaḥ|indra̱m|Eva|marutvantam|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|sajAtAniti̍# sa - jAtAn|prEti|yacCati|grAmI|Eva|Bavati|yat|RuṣaBaḥ|tEna̍|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saM~Myatta̍ indriyEṇa vai manyunA manasA̍ saMgrAmaM jayatIndra̍mEva̍ manyumantaM̍ manasvantaṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsminnindriyaM̍ manyuM manO# dadhAti jayati̍ taṃ sagrAMqmamindrA̍ya̍ marutvatE̍ pRuśnisakthamA laBEta̍ grAmakAma̍ indramEva̍ marutvantaṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai# sa jAtAn prayacCati̍ grAmyEva̍ Bavati̍ yadRuṣaBastEnai̍ - [ ] 17

verses.padam: (Padam) aindraḥ|yat|pRuśniḥ|tEna̍|mArutaḥ|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM-Ruddhyai|paścAt|pRuśnisaktha iti# pRuśni - sakthaḥ|Bavati|paścAdanvavasAyinImiti# paścAt - anvavasAyinI̱m|Eva|asmai|viśa̱m|karOti|saumyam|baBrum|Eti|laBEta|anna̍kAma̍ ityanna# - kAmaḥ|saumyam|vai|anna̱m|sOma̱m|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|prEti̍|yacCati|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|Eva|Bavati|baBruḥ|Bavati|Etat|vai|annasya|rUpam|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|saumyam|baBrum|Eti|laBEta|yam|ala̱m|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ndrO yat pRuśnistEna# mArutaḥ samRuddhyai̍ paścAt pRuśnisakthO̍ Bavati̍ paścAdanva-vasAyinImEvAsmai̍ viśaM̍ karOti saumyaM baBrumA laBEtAnna̍kAmaḥ̍ saumyaM ~MvA annaṃq sOmamEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmA annaM praya#cCatyannAda̍ Eva Bavati̍ baBrurBavatyEtadvA̍ annasya̍ rUpaṃ samRuddhyai̍ saumyaM baBrumA laBEta̍ yamalaṃ# - [ ] 18

verses.padam: (Padam) rAjyAya|santa̱m|rAjyam|na|upanamEdityu̍pa-namE̱t|saumyam|vai|rAjyam|sOma̱m|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|rAjyam|prEti̍|yacCati|upEti̍|Enam|rAjyam|namati|baBruḥ|Bavati|Etat|vai|sOma̍sya|rUpam|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|indrAya|vRutratura̍ iti# vRutra - turE̱|lalAma̱m|prAśRu~ggam|Eti|laBEta|gataśrIriti̍# gata - śrIḥ|pratiṣṭhAkAma̍ iti# pratiṣṭhA - kAmaḥ|pApmAna̱m|Eva|vRutram|tIrtvA|pratiṣṭhAmiti# prati - sthAm|gacCati|indrAya|aBimAtiGna̍ ityaBimAti̍ - GnE|lalAma̱m|prAśRu~ggam|Eti|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rAjyAya santaṃ# rAjyaM nOpanamE̱th saumyaM ~Mvai rAjya sOmamEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai# rAjyaM prayacCatyupai̍naṃ̍ rAjyaM namati̍ baBrurBavatyEtad̍ vai sOmasya̍ rUpaṃ samRuddhyA̍ indrAya̍ vRutraturE# lalAmaM̍ prAśRu~ggamA laBEta̍ gataśrI̱ḥ pratiṣṭhAkAmaḥ̍ pApmAnamEva̍ vRutraM tIrtvA pratiṣṭhAM̍ gacCatIndrA̍yABimAtiGnE̍ lalAmaM̍ prAśRu~ggamA - [ ] 19

verses.padam: (Padam) laBEta|yaḥ|pApmanA̱|gRuhItaḥ|syAt|pApmA|vai|aBimAtirityaBi̍ - mAtiḥ|indra̱m|Eva|aBimAtihanamityaBimAti̍ - hana̱m|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmAt|pApmAna̱m|aBimA̍timityaBi̍ - mAtim|prEti|nudatE|indrA̍ya|vajriṇE̱|lalAma̱m|prAśRu~ggam|Eti̍|laBEta|yam|ala̱m|rAjyAya̍|santa̱m|rAjyam|na|upanamEdityu̍pa̍ - namE̱t|indra̱m|Eva|vajriṇa̱m|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|vajra̱m|prEti̍|yacCati|saḥ|Enam̍ ( )|vajraḥ|BUtyai̱|indhE|upEti̍|Enam|rAjyam|namati|lalAma̍ḥ|prAśRu~ggaḥ|Bavati|Etat|vai|vajra̍sya|rUpam|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai||20 (65)
verses.samhita: laBEta̍ yaḥ pApmanA# gRuhItaḥ syAt pApmA vA aBimAtirindra̍mEvA-̍ BimAtihanaṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmA̱t pApmAnamaBimA̍tiM̍ praṇudata̍ indrAya̍ vajriṇE# lalAmaM̍ prAśRu~ggamA laBEta̍ yamalaṃ# rAjyAya santaṃ# rAjyaM nOpanamEdindramEva̍ vajriṇaṅq svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai vajraM pra yacCati̍ sa EnaM̍ ( ) ~MvajrO BUtyA# indha upainaṃ̍ rAjyaM namati̍ lalAmaḥ̍ prAśRu~ggO BavatyEtadvai̍ vajrasya̍ rUpaṃ samRuddhyai||20̍

verses.padam: (Padam) asau|Adityaḥ|na|vIti|arOcata|tasmai̱|dEvAḥ|prAya̍ścittim|aicCann|tasmai̱|EtAm|daśa̍ṛṣaBAmiti̍ daśa# - RuṣaBAm|Eti|alaBanta|tayA̱|Eva|asminn|ruca̱m|adadhuḥ|yaḥ|brahmavarcasakA̍ma̍ iti# brahmavarcasa - kAmaḥ|syAt|tasmai̱|EtAm|daśaṛṣaBAmiti̍ daśa# - RuṣaBAm|Eti|laBEta|amum|Eva|Adityam|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asminn|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|dadhAti|brahmavarcasIti# brahma - varcasI|Eva|Bavati|vasantA̱|prAtaḥ|trIn|lalAmAn|Eti̍|laBEta|grIṣmE|maddhyandi̍nE|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: asAvAdityO̍ na vyarOcata̍ tasmai# dEvAḥ prAyaścittimaicCan̍ tasmA# EtAM daśaṛṣaBAmA&la̍Banta̍ tayaivAsmin rucamadadhuryO̍ brahmavarcasakA̍maḥ̍ syAt tasmA# EtAM daśaṛṣaBAmA̍ laBEtA-mumEvA&&*dityaṅ̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmin̍ brahmavarcasaM dadhAti̍ brahmavarcasyEva̍ Bavati̍ vasantA̱ prAtastrIn ~MlalAmAnA laBEta̍ grIṣmE maddhyandinE̍ - [ ] 21

verses.padam: (Padam) trIn|śitipRuṣṭhAniti# śiti - pRuṣṭhAn|śaradi|aparAhṇa̍ ityapara-ahnE|trIn|śitivArAniti̍# śiti - vArAn|trIṇi̍|vai|Adityasya̍|tEjAṃ̍si|vasantA̱|prAtaḥ|grIṣmE|maddhyandi̍nE|śaradi̍|aparAhṇa̍ ityapara-ahnE|yAva̍nti|Eva|tEjAṃ̍si|tAni̍|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|traya̍straya̍ iti trayaḥ-trayaḥ|Eti̍|laByantE|aBipUrvamitya̍Bi̍ - pUrvam|Eva|asminn|tEjaḥ|dadhAti|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|paryAlaByanta̍ iti# pari-AlaByantE|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|brahmavarcasasyEti# brahma - varcasasya|pradAtEti̍# pra - dAtA|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|Eva|asmai|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|prEti|yacCati|brahmavarcasIti̍# brahma - varcasI|Eva|Bavati|saMq~MvathsarasyEti# saM - vathsarasya|parastA̱t|prAjApatyamiti̍# prAjA - patyam|kadru̱m|22 (50)
verses.samhita: trI~jCiti̍ pRuṣṭhA~jCaradyaparAhṇE̍ trI~jCitivArAn̍ trIṇi vA Adityasya̍ tEjAṃsi̍ vasantA̱ prAtargrIṣmE maddhyandinE̍ śaradyaparAhṇE̍ yAvantyEva̍ tEjAṃsi̍ tAnyEvAva# rundhE trayastraya̍ A laByantE-&Bi̍ pUrvamEvAsmin tEjO# dadhAti saM~MvathsaraM paryAlaByantE̍ saM~MvathsarO vai brahmavarcasasya̍# pradAtA saM~Mvathsara̍ EvAsmai̱ brahmavarcasaM pra yacCati̍ brahmavarcasyEva̍ Bavati̍ saM~Mvathsarasya# parastA̱t prAjApatyaM kadru - [ ] 22

verses.padam: (Padam) Eti|laBEta|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|dEvatAsu|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|yadi̍|biBIyAt|duścarmEti̍# duḥ-carmA̱|BaviṣyAmi|iti|sOmApauṣṇamiti̍# sOmA - pauṣṇam|śyAmam|Eti|laBEta|saumyaḥ|vai|dEvata̍yA|puru̍ṣaḥ|pauṣṇAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|svayA̱|Eva|asmai|dEvata̍yA|paśuBiriti̍# paśu - Biḥ|tvaca̱m|karOti|na|duścarmEti# duḥ - carmA̱|Bavati|dEvAḥ|ca|vai|yamaḥ|ca|asminn|lOkE|aspardhanta|saḥ|yamaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|indriyam|vIrya̱m|ayuvata|tat|yamasya|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mA laBEta̍ prajApatiḥ̍ sarvA# dEvatA# dEvatA̱svEva pratitiṣṭhati̍ yadi# biBIyAd-duścarmA# BaviṣyAmIti# sOmApauṣṇaṅ śyAmamA laBEta̍ saumyO vai dEvatayA̍ puruṣaḥ̍ pauṣṇAḥ paśavaḥ svayaivAsmai# dEvatayA̍ paśuBistvacaM̍ karOti na duścarmA# Bavati dEvAśca vai yamaścAsmin ~MlOkE̱&sparddhanta sa yamO dEvAnAmindriyaM̍ ~MvIryamayuvata̍ tadyamasya# - [ ] 23

verses.padam: (Padam) yamatvamiti# yama - tvam|tE|dEvAḥ|amanyanta|yamaḥ|vai|idam|aBUt|yat|vayam|smaḥ|iti|tE|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|upEti|adhAvann|saḥ|Etau|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|Atmanaḥ|ukṣavaśAvityu̍kṣa̍ - vaśau|niriti|amimIta|tE|dEvAḥ|vaiṣṇAvaruṇImiti̍# vaiṣṇA-varuṇIm|vaśAm|Eti|alaBanta|aindram|ukṣAṇa̱m|tam|varu̍ṇEna|Eva|grAhayitvA|viṣṇu̍nA|yajñEna̍|prEti̍|anudanta|aindrEṇa̍|Eva|asya|indriyam|avRu~jjata|yaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyavAniti̍ BrAtRuvya̍ - vAn|syAt|saḥ|sparddhamAnaḥ|vaiṣṇAvaruṇImiti̍# vaiṣṇA - varuṇIm|24 (50)
verses.samhita: yamatvaM tE dEvA amanyanta̍ yamO vA idamaBUd-yad-vayaṅ̍ sma iti tE prajApatimupA̍dhAvanth̍ sa Etau prajApatirAtmana̍# ukṣavaśau niramimIta̍ tE dEvA vai̱ṣṇAvaruṇIM ~MvaśAmA-&laBantaindramukṣAṇataM̍ ~MvaruṇEnaiva̍ grAhayitvA̍ viṣṇunA̍ yajñEna prAṇudantaindrEṇai-vAsyE̱ndriyama̍-vRu~jjata̍ yO BrAtRuvyavAnth̍ syAth sa sparddhamAnO̍ vaiṣṇAvaruṇIM - [ ] 24

verses.padam: (Padam) vaśAm|Eti|laBEta|aindram|ukṣAṇa̱m|varu̍ṇEna|Eva|BrAtRu̍vyam|grAhayitvA|viṣṇu̍nA|yajñEna̍|prEti̍|nudatE|aindrEṇa̍|Eva|asya|indriyam|vRu~gktE|Bava̍ti|AtmanA̱|parEti̍|asya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|Bavati|indra̍ḥ|vRutram|ahann|tam|vRutraḥ|hataḥ|ṣOḍaśaBiriti̍# ṣOḍaśa - Biḥ|BOgaiḥ|asinAt|tasya|vRutrasya̍|śIṛqṣataḥ|gAva̍ḥ|uditi̍|Ayann|tAḥ|vaidEhya̍ḥ|aBavann|tAsA̱m|RuṣaBaḥ|jaGanE̱|anu̍|uditi̍|ait|tam|indra̍ḥ|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MvaśAmA laBEtaindramukṣAṇaM̍ ~MvaruṇEnaiva̍ BrAtRuvyaM̍ grAhayitvA viṣṇunA̍ yajñEna praṇudata̍ aindrEṇaivAsyE̱ndriyaM ~MvRu~gktE̍ BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱sya BrAtRuvyO̍ BavatIndrO# vRutramahan̍ taM ~MvRutrO hataḥ ṣOḍaśaBi̍-rBOgaira̍sinAt̍ tasya# vRutrasya# śIṛṣatO gAva udAyan̍ tA vaidEhyO̍&Bavan̍ tAsAmRuṣaBO̍ jaGanE&nUdait tamindrO# - [ ] 25

verses.padam: (Padam) acAyat|saḥ|amanyata|yaḥ|vai|imam|AlaBEtEtyA̱ - laBEta|mucyE̍ta|asmAt|pApmana̍ḥ|iti̍|saḥ|AgnEyam|kRuṣṇagrI̍vamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - grIvam|Eti|alaBata|aindram|RuṣaBam|tasya̍|agniḥ|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upa̍sRuta̍ ityupa# - sRutaḥ|ṣOḍaśadhEti# ṣOḍaśa-dhA|vRutrasya|BOgAn|apIti̍|adahat|aindrEṇa̍|indriyam|Atmann|adhatta|yaḥ|pApmanA̱|gRuhItaḥ|syAt|saḥ|AgnEyam|kRuṣṇagrI̍vamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - grIvam|Eti|laBEta|aindram|RuṣaBam|agniḥ|Eva|asya|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upa̍sRuta̍ ityupa# - sRutaḥ|26 (50)
verses.samhita: &cAyath sO&manyata̍ yO vA imamAlaBEta̍ mucyEtAsmAt̍ pApmana iti sa A̱gnEyaM kRuṣṇagrIvamA̍ laBataindramRu̍ṣaBaM̍ tasyAgnirEva svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# sRutaḥ ṣOḍaśadhA vRutrasya# BOgAnapyadahadaindrEṇE̱ndriya-̍ mAtmannadhatta̍ yaḥ pApmanA# gRuhItaḥ syAth sa A̱gnEyaM kRuṣṇagrIvamA̍ laBEtaindramRu̍ṣaBa-magnirEvAsya̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpasRutaḥ̍ - [ ] 26

verses.padam: (Padam) pApmAna̱m|apIti|dahati|aindrEṇa̍|indriyam|Atmann|dhattE|mucya̍tE|pApmana̍ḥ|Bava̍ti|Eva|dyAvApRuthivyA̍miti̍# dyAvA - pRuthivyA̱m|dhEnum|Eti|laBEta|jyOga̍paruddha̍ iti jyOk - aparuddhaḥ|anayO̱ḥ|hi|vai|Eṣaḥ|apratiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|atha|Eṣaḥ|jyOk|apa̍ruddha̍ ityapa# - ruddhaḥ|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tE̍ iti|Eva|Enam|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|gamayataḥ|pratIti|Eva|tiṣṭhati|paryAriṇI̱|Bavati|paryAri|iva|hi|Etasya̍|rAṣṭram|yaḥ|jyOga̍paruddha̍ iti jyOk - aparuddhaḥ|samRuddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|vAyavya̱m|27 (50)
verses.samhita: pApmAnamapi# dahatyaindrEṇE̱ndriyamAtman dhattE̍ mucyatE̍ pApmanO BavatyEva̍ dyAvApRuthivyA̱M̍ dhEnumA laBEta̍ jyOgaparuddhO̍ &nayOrqqḥi vA EṣO&pratiṣṭhitO&thaiṣa̍ jyOgaparuddhO̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ Eva svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tE EvainaM̍ pratiṣṭhAM gamayataḥ̍ pratyEva tiṣṭhati̍ paryAriṇI# Bavati paryArIva hyEtasya̍# rAṣṭraM ~MyO jyOgaparuddhaḥ̍ samRuddhyai̍ vAyavyaM̍ - [ ] 27

verses.padam: (Padam) vathsam|Eti|laBEta|vAyuḥ|vai|anayO̱ḥ|vathsaḥ|imE|vai|Etasmai̱|lOkAḥ|apa̍śuṣkA̍ ityapa# - śuṣkAḥ|viṭ|apaśuṣkEtyapa̍# - śuṣkA|atha|Eṣaḥ|jyOk|apa̍ruddha̍ ityapa# - ruddhaḥ|vAyum|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|imAn|lOkAn|viśa̱m|prEti̍|dApayati|prEti̍|asmai|imE|lOkAḥ|snuvanti|Bu~jjatI|Enam|viṭ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE||28̍ (42) (madhyandinE̍ - kadruM̍ - ~Myamasya - spardhamAnO̍ vaiṣṇAvaruṇIM -tamindrO̱ - &sya svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpasRutO̍ - vAyavyaM̍ - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: ~MvathsamA laBEta̍ vAyurvA anayO̱rvathsa imE vA Etasmai# lOkA apaśuṣkA̍ viḍapaśuṣkA&thaiṣa̍ jyOgaparuddhO̍ vAyumEva svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmA# imAM ~MlOkAn. viśaM pradApayati̍ prAsmA# imE lOkAḥ snuvantiBu~jjatyE̍naM̍ ~MviḍupatiṣṭhatE||28̍ (madhyandinE̍ - kadruM̍ - ~Myamasya - sparddhamAnO̍ vaiṣṇAvaruṇIM -tamindrO̱ - &sya svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpasRutO̍ - vAyavyaM̍ - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) indraḥ|valasya̍|bila̱m|apEti̍|aurṇOt|saḥ|yaḥ|uttama̍ ityut̍ - tamaḥ|paśuḥ|AsI̱t|tam|pRuṣṭham|pratIti|sagRuMhyEti̍# saM - gRuhya|uditi̍|akKidat|tam|sahasra̱m|paśava̍ḥ|anu̍|uditi̍|Ayann|saḥ|unnata̍ ityut̍ - nataḥ|aBavat|yaḥ|paśukAma̍ iti# paśu-kAmaḥ|syAt|saḥ|Etam|aindram|unnatamityut-natam|Eti̍|laBEta|indra̱m|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|paśUn|prEti̍|yacCati|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|Eva|Bavati|unnata ityut̍ - nataḥ|29 (49)
verses.samhita: indrO# valasya bilamapau̱rṇOth sa ya uttamaḥ̍ paśurAsIt taM pRuṣṭhaM prati# sagRuMhyOdakKidat̍ taṃ sahasraM̍ paśavO&nUdAyanth̍ sa unnatO̍&Bavadyaḥ̍ paśukAmaḥ̍ syAth sa EtamaindramunnatamA̍ laBEtEndra̍mEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai# paśUn prayacCati̍ paśumAnEva BavatyunnatO̍ - [ ] 29

verses.padam: (Padam) Bavati|sAhasrI|vai|EṣA|lakṣmI|yat|unnata ityut̍ - nataḥ|lakṣmiyA̱|Eva|paśUn|avEti|rundhE|yadA|sahasra̱m|paśUn|prApnuyAditi̍# pra - ApnuyAt|atha|vaiṣṇavam|vAmanam|Eti̍|laBEta|Etasminn̍|vai|tat|sahasra̱m|adhIti̍|atiṣṭhat|tasmA̱t|Eṣaḥ|vAmanaḥ|samI̍ṣita̍ iti saM - Iṣitaḥ|paśuBya iti# paśu - Byaḥ|Eva|prajAtEBya̍ iti pra - jAtEByaḥ|pratiṣṭhAmiti# prati - sthAm|dadhAti|kaḥ|arqḥati|sahasra̱m|paśUn|prAptumiti pra - Aptum|iti|Ahuḥ|ahOrAtrAṇItya̍haḥ̍ - rAtrAṇi|Eva|sahasra̱m|sampAdyEti̍# saM - pAdya|Eti̍|laBEta|paśava̍ḥ|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Bavati̍ sAhasrI vA EṣA lakṣmI yadunnatO̍ lakṣmiyai va paśUnava# rundhE yadA sahasraM̍ paśUn prA̱pnuyAdatha# vaiṣṇavaM ~MvAmanamA̍ laBEtaitasmin.̍ vai tath sahasramaddhyatiṣṭhat̍ tasmAdEṣa̍ vAmanaḥ̍ samIṣitaḥ̍ paśuBya# Eva prajAtEByaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhAM dadhAti̍ kO&ṛhati̍ sahasraM̍ paśUn prAptumityAhu-̍ rahOrAtrAṇyEva sahasraṃ# sampAdyA&&*laBEta̍ paśavO - [ ] 30

verses.padam: (Padam) vai|ahOrAtrAṇIityahaḥ̍ - rAtrAṇi|paśUn|Eva|prajA̍tAniti̍ pra - jAtAn|pratiṣṭhAmiti# prati - sthAm|gamayati|OṣadhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|vEhata̱m|Eti|laBEta|prajAkA̍ma̍ iti# prajA - kAmaḥ|Oṣadhayaḥ|vai|Etam|prajAyA̍ iti# pra - jAyai̱|parIti|bAdhantE|yaḥ|ala̱m|prajAyA̍ iti# pra - jAyai̱|sann|prajAmiti# pra-jAm|na|vindatE̱|Oṣadhayaḥ|Kalu̍|vai|Etasyai̱|sUtu̱m|apIti̍|Gnanti|yA|vEhat|Bava̍ti|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tAḥ|Eva|asmai|svAt|yOnE̱ḥ|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|prEti|janayanti|vindatE̱|31(50)̍
verses.samhita: vA ahOrAtrAṇi̍# paśUnEva prajAtAn̍ pratiṣṭhAM gamaya-tyOṣa̍dhIByO̍ vEhatamA laBEta̍ prajAkAma̍ OṣadhayO̍ vA EtaM prajAyai paribAdhantE̍ yO&laM̍ prajAyai san prajAM na vindata Oṣadhayaḥ̍ Kalu vA Etasyai sUtumapi# Gnanti yA vEhad-BavatyOṣadhIrEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tA EvAsmai svAdyOnE̱ḥ prajAM pra janayanti̍ vindatE̱ - [ ] 31

verses.padam: (Padam) prajAmiti# pra - jAm|Apaḥ|vai|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|asa̍t|puru̍ṣaḥ|Apa̍ḥ|Eva|asmai|asa̍taḥ|sat|dadati|tasmA̱t|Ahuḥ|yaḥ|ca|Evam|vEda̍|yaḥ|ca|na|Apa̍ḥ|tu|vAva|asa̍taḥ|sat|dadati|iti̍|aindrIm|sUtava̍śAmiti̍# sUta - vaśAm|Eti|laBEta|BUti̍kAma̍ iti BUti# - kAmaḥ|ajAtaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yaḥ|ala̱m|BUtyai̱|sann|BUti̱m|na|prApnOtIti̍# pra - ApnOti|indra̱m|Kalu̍|vai|EṣA|sUtvA|vaśA|aBavat|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajAmApO vA OṣadhayO&sat̍ puruṣa̍ Apa# EvAsmA asataḥ̍ saddadati̍ tasmAdAhuryaścaivaM̍ ~MvEda yaśca nApastvAvAsataḥ̍ saddadatI-tyaindrIṃ̍ sUtavaśAmA̍ laBEta̍ BUtikAmO&jA̍tO̍ vA Eṣa yO&laM BUtyai san BUtiM na prApnOtIndraM Kalu vA EṣA sUtvA vaśA&Bava̍ - [ ] 32

verses.padam: (Padam) indra̱m|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|Enam|BUti̱m|gamayati|Bava̍ti|Eva|yam|sUtvA|vaśA|syAt|tam|aindram|Eva|Eti̍|laBEta|Etat|vAva|tat|indriyam|sAkṣAditi̍# sa - akṣAt|Eva|indriyam|avEti|rundhE|aindrAgnamityai̱ndra̍ - agnam|punaruthsRuṣṭamiti# punaḥ - uthsRuṣṭam|Eti|laBEta|yaḥ|Eti̍|tRutIyA̱t|puru̍ṣAt|sOma̱m|na|pibE̱t|vicCi̍nna̍ iti vi - Cinnaḥ|vai|Etasya|sOmapItha̍ iti# sOma - pIthaḥ|yaḥ|brAhmaṇaḥ|sann|Eti|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -dindramEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvainaM BUtiM̍ gamayati BavatyEva̍ yaṃ sUtvA vaśA syAt tamaindramEvA&&* laBEtaitadvAva̍ tadindriyaṃ̍ sAkṣAdEvEndriyamava# rundha aindrAgnaM punaruth̍ sRuṣṭamA laBEta̍ ya A tRutIyAt puruṣAth̍ sOmaM na pibEd-vicCinnO̍ vA Etasya# sOmapIthO yO brA̱hmaṇaḥ sannA - [ ] 33

verses.padam: (Padam) tRutIyA̱t|puruṣAt|sOma̱m|na|piba̍ti|indrAgnI̍ itI̱ndra - agnI|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tau|Eva|asmai|sOmapIthamiti̍# sOma - pItham|prEti|yacCataḥ|upEti̍|Enam|sOmapItha̍ iti# sOma - pIthaḥ|namati|yat|aindraḥ|Bavati|indriyam|vai|sOmapItha̍ iti# sOma-pIthaḥ|indriyam|Eva|sOmapIthamiti# sOma - pItham|avEti|rundhE|yat|AgnEyaḥ|Bava̍ti|AgnEyaḥ|vai|brAhmaṇaḥ|svAm|Eva|dEvatA̱m|anu̍|samiti̍|tanOti|punaruthsRuṣṭa̍ iti# punaḥ-uthsRuṣṭaḥ|Bavati|punaruthsRuṣṭa iti# punaḥ - uthsRuṣṭaḥ|iva|hi|Etasya|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tRutIyAt puruṣAth̍ sOmaM na pibatIndrAgnI̍ Eva svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tAvEvAsmai# sOmapIthaM prayacCata̍ upainaṃ̍ sOmapIthO namati̍ yadaindrO BavatIndriyaM̍ ~Mvai sOmapItha̍ indriyamEva̍ sOmapIthamava̍# rundhE yadA̱gnEyO BavatyAgnEyO̍ vai brA̱hmaṇaḥ svAmEva dEvatAmanu saMtanOti̍ punaruth^^sRuṣṭO Bavati̍ punaruth^^sRuṣṭa iva̍ hyEtasya̍# - [ ] 34

verses.padam: (Padam) sOmapItha iti# sOma - pIthaḥ|samRuddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|brAhmaṇaspatyamiti# brAhmaṇaḥ - patyam|tUparam|Eti|laBEta|aBicarannitya̍Bi̍ - carann|brahma̍ṇaḥ|pati̱m|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tasmai̱|Eva|Enam|Eti̍|vRuścati|tAjak|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|tUparaḥ|Bavati|kṣurapa̍viriti̍# kṣura - paviḥ|vai|EṣA|lakṣmI|yat|tUparaḥ|samRuddhya̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|sPyaḥ|yUpaḥ|Bavati|vajra̍ḥ|vai|sPyaḥ|vajra̱m|Eva|asmai|prEti̍|harati|śaramayamiti̍# śara - maya̱m|barqḥiḥ|śRuṇAti|Eva|Enam|vaiBI̍dakaḥ|iddhmaḥ̍ ( )|Binatti|Eva|Enam||35̍ (53)
verses.samhita: sOmapIthaḥ samRuddhyai̍ brAhmaṇaspatyaM tUparamA̍ laBEtA-Bicaran̍ brahmaṇaspati̍mEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tasmA# EvainamA vRuścati̍ tAjagArti-mArcCati̍ tUparO Bavati̍ kṣurapavirvA̍ EṣA lakṣmI yat tUparaḥ̍ samRuddhyai̍ sPyO yUpO# Bavati vajrO vai sPyO vajramEvAsmai̍ praharati̍ śaramayaM̍ barqḥiḥ śRuṇAtyEvainaM ~MvaiBIdaka̍ iddhmO ( ) BinattyEvaina̱M||35

verses.padam: (Padam) bAṛqhaspatyam|śitipRuṣṭhamiti# śiti - pRuṣṭham|Eti|laBEta|grAma̍kAma̍ iti grAma# - kAmaḥ|yaḥ|kAmayEta|pRuṣṭham|samAnAnA̱m|syAm|iti̍|bRuhaspati̱m|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|Enam|pRuṣṭham|samAnAnA̱m|karOti|grAmI|Eva|Bavati|śitipRuṣṭha̍ iti# śiti - pRuṣṭhaḥ|Bavati|bAṛqhaspatyaḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|dEvatayA|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|pauṣṇam|śyAmam|Eti|laBEta|anna̍kAma̍ ityanna# - kAmaḥ|anna̱m|vai|pUṣA|pUṣaṇa̱m|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: bArqḥaspatyaṃ śitipRuṣṭhamA̍ laBEta̍ grAmakAmO̍ yaḥ kAmayEta̍ pRuṣṭhaṃ samAnAnAṅ̍# syAmiti bRuhaspatimEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvainaM̍ pRuṣṭhaṃ samAnAnA̱M̍ karOti grAmyEva̍ Bavati̍ śitipRuṣṭhO Bavati̍ bAṛhaspatyO hyEṣa̍ dEvatayA̍ samRuddhyai̍ pauṣṇaṅ śyAmamA laBEtAnna̍kAmO&nnaM̍ ~Mvai pUṣA pUṣaṇamEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmA - [ ] 36

verses.padam: (Padam) anna̱m|prEti|yacCati|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|Eva|Bavati|śyAmaḥ|Bavati|Etat|vai|annasya|rUpam|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|mArutam|pRuśni̱m|Eti|laBEta|anna̍kAma̍ ityanna# - kAmaḥq|anna̱m|vai|marutaḥ|maruta̍ḥ|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tE|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|prEti̍|yacCanti|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|Eva|Bavati|pRuśniḥ|Bavati|Etat|vai|anna̍sya|rUpam|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|aindram|aruṇam|Eti|laBEta|indriyakA̍ma̍ itI̱ndriya - kAmaḥ|indra̱m|Eva|37 (50)
verses.samhita: annaM pra yacCatyannAda̍ Eva Bavati̍ śyAmO BavatyEtadvA̍ annasya̍ rUpaṃ samRuddhyai̍ mArutaM pRuśnimA laBEtA&nna̍-kAmO&nnaM̍ ~Mvai marutOmaruta̍# Eva svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati ta EvAsmA annaM prayacCantyannAda^^Eva̍ Bavati̍ pRuśni# rBavatyEtadvA annasya̍ rUpaṃ samRuddhyA̍ aindramaruṇamA̍ laBEtEndriyakA̍ma̍ indramEva̍ - [ ] 37

verses.padam: (Padam) svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asminn|indriyam|dadhAti|indriyAvI|Eva|Bavati|aruṇaḥ|BrUmAniti̍ BrU - mAn|Bavati|aitat|vai|indrasya|rUpam|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|sAvitram|upaddhvastamityupa̍ - dhvastam|Eti|laBEta|sanikA̍ma̍ iti# sani - kAmaḥ|savitA|vai|prasavAnAmiti# pra-savAnA̱m|IśE|savitAra̱m|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|sanim|prEti̍|suvati|dAna̍kAmA̍ iti dAna-kAmAḥ|asmai|prajA̍ iti# pra-jAḥ|Bavanti|upaddhvasta ityupa̍ - dhvastaḥ|Bavati|sAvitraḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|38 (50)
verses.samhita: svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsminnindriyaM̍ dadhAtIndriyAvyE̍va̍ BavatyaruṇO̍ BrUmA̱n BavatyEtadvA indrasya̍ rUpaṃ samRuddhyai̍ sAvitramupaddhvastamA̍ laBEta̍ sanikAmaḥ̍ savitA vai prasavAnA̍mIśE̍ savitAramEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai# saniM prasuvati̍ dAnakAmA̍ asmai prajA BavantyupaddhvastO̍ Bavati̍ sAvitrO hyEṣa-̍ [ ] 38

verses.padam: (Padam) dEvatayA|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva-dEvam|bahurUpamiti# bahu - rUpam|Eti|laBEta|anna̍kAma̍ ityanna# - kAmaḥ|vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva - dEvam|vai|anna̱m|viśvAn|Eva|dEvAn|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tE|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|prEti̍|yacCanti|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|Eva|Bavati|bahurUpa iti# bahu-rUpaḥ|Bavati|bahurUpamiti# bahu - rUpam|hi|anna̱m|samRuddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva - dEvam|bahurUpamiti# bahu - rUpam|Eti|laBEta|grAma̍kAma̍ iti grAma# - kAmaḥ|vaiśvadEvA iti# vaiśva - dEvAḥ|vai|sajAtA iti# sa - jAtAḥ|viśvAn|Eva|dEvAn|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tE|Eva|asmai|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvatayA̍ samRuddhyai̍ vaiśvadEvaM bahurUpamA̍ laBEtA&nna̍kAmOvaiśvadEvaM̍ ~MvA annaM ~MviśvAnEva̍ dEvAnth-svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvatita EvAsmA annaM prayacCantyannAda̍ Eva Bavati̍ bahurUpO BavatibahurUpaṅ̍ hyannaṃq samRuddhyai̍ vaiśvadEvaM bahurUpamA̍ laBEta̍ grAmakAmO̍ vaiśvadEvA vai sajAtA̍ viśvAnEva̍ dEvAnth-svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati ta EvAsmai# - [ ] 39

verses.padam: (Padam) sajAtAniti# sa-jAtAn|prEti|yacCanti|grAmI|Eva|Bavati|bahurUpa̍ iti# bahu - rUpaḥ|Bavati|bahudEvatya# iti# bahu-dEvatyaḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|prajApatyamiti# prAjA - patyam|tUparam|Eti|laBEta|yasya̍|anA̱jñAtamityanA̱̍ - jñAtam|iva|jyOk|AmayE̱t|prAjApatya iti# prAjA - patyaḥ|vai|puruṣaḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|Kalu|vai|tasya̍|vEda|yasya̍|anA̱jñAtamityanA̱̍ - jñAtam|iva|jyOk|Amayati|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|Enam|tasmA̱t|srAmA̱t|mu~jcati|tUparaḥ|Bavati|prAjApatya̍ iti# prAjA-patyaḥ|hi ( )|Eṣaḥ|dEvatayA|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai||40 (53)
verses.samhita: sajAtAn pra yacCanti̍ grAmyEva̍ Bavati̍ bahurUpO Bavati̍ bahudEvatyO̱(1q) hyEṣa̍ samRuddhyai̍ prAjApatyaM tUparamA̍ laBEta̍ yasyAnA̱jñAtamiva jyOgAmayE̱t prAjApatyO vai puruṣaḥ̍ prajApatiḥ̍ Kalu vai tasya# vEda yasyAnA̱jñAtamiva jyOgAmayati̍ prajApatimEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvainaM tasmAth srAmA̱n-mu~jcati tUparO Bavati̍ prAjApatyO hyE# ( ) -ṣa dEvatayA̍ samRuddhyai||40̍

verses.padam: (Padam) vaṣaṭkAra iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|vai|gAyatriyai|śiraḥ|acCinat|tasyai̱|rasa̍ḥ|parEti̍|apatat|tam|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|upEti̍|agRuhṇAt|sA|śitipRuṣṭhEti̍# śiti - paṣṭhA|vaśA|aBavat|yaḥ|dvitIyaḥ|parApa̍taditi̍# parA - apatat|tam|mitrAvaru̍ṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|upEti̍|agRuhṇItAm|sA|dvirUpEti̍# dvi - rUpA|vaśA|aBavat|yaḥ|tRutIyaḥ|parApa̍taditi̍# parA - apatat|tam|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|upEti̍|agRuhṇann|sA|bahurUpEti̍# bahu - rUpA|vaśA|aBavat|yaḥ|caturthaḥ|parApataditi̍# parA - apatat|saḥ|pRuthivIm|prEti̍|aviśat|tam|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|aBIti̍|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vaṣaṭkArO vai gAyatriyai̍ śirO̱&cCinat tasyai rasaḥ parApatat̍ taM bRuhaspati rupA&gRuhṇAth^^sA̍ śitipRuṣṭhA̍ vaśA&BavadyO̍ dvitIyaḥ̍ parA&patat̍ taM mitrAvaruṇA-vupA̍gRuhṇItAṃq̍ sA dvirUpA̍ vaśA&Bavad-yastRutIya̍ḥ̍ parApatat̍ taM ~MviśvE# dEvA upAgRuhṇanth̍ sA bahurUpA̍ vaśA Bavadya-śca̍turtthaḥ̍ parApatath̍ sa pRuthivIM̍ prA&viśat̍ taM bRuhaspatiraBya̍# - [ ] 41

verses.padam: (Padam) agRuhṇAt|astu|Eva|ayam|BOgA̍ya|iti̍|saḥ|ukṣavaśa̍ ityukṣa̍ - vaśaḥ|samiti|aBavat|yat|lOhi̍tam|parApa̍taditi̍# parA - apatat|tat|rudraḥ|upEti̍|agRuhṇAt|sA|raudrI|rOhi̍ṇI|vaśA|aBavat|bAṛqhaspatyAm|śitipRuṣṭhAmiti̍# śiti - pRuṣṭhAm|Eti|laBEta|brahmavarcasakA̍ma̍ iti# brahmavarcasa - kAmaḥ|bRuhaspati̱m|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asminn|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|dadhAti|brahmavarcasIti# brahma - varcasI|Eva|Bavati|CandasAm|vai|Eṣaḥ|rasa̍ḥ|yat|vaśA|rasa̍ḥ|iva|Kalu̍|42̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -gRuhṇA-dastvEvAyaM BOgAyEti sa ukṣavaśaḥ̍ samaBavad-yallOhi̍taM̍ parApatat̍ tad-rudra upA&gRuhṇAth̍ sA raudrI rOhiṇI̍ vaśA&Bavad-̍ bAṛhaspatyAṃ śitipRuṣṭhAmA̍ laBEta̍ brahmavarcasakAmO̍ bRuhaspatimEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmin̍ brahmavarcasaM dadhAti̍ brahmavarcasyEva̍ Bavati̍ CandasAM̍ ~MvA Eṣa rasO yadvaśA rasa# iva Kalu- [ ] 42

verses.padam: (Padam) vai|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|CandasAm|Eva|rasE̍na|rasa̱m|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|avEti|rundhE|maitrAvaruṇImiti̍# maitrA - varuṇIm|dvirUpAmiti# dvi - rUpAm|Eti|laBEta|vRuṣṭi̍kAma̍ iti vRuṣṭi# - kAmaḥ|maitram|vai|ahaḥ|vAruṇI|rAtri̍ḥ|ahOrAtrAByAmitya̍haḥ̍ - rAtrAByA̱m|Kalu|vai|parjanya̍ḥ|vaṛqṣati|mitrAvaru̍ṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tau|Eva|asmai|ahOrAtrAByAmitya̍haḥ̍ - rAtrAByA̱m|parjanya̱m|vaṛqṣayataḥ|CandasAm|vai|Eṣaḥ|rasa̍ḥ|yat|vaśA|rasa̍ḥ|iva|Kalu̍|vai|vRuṣṭi̍ḥ|Canda̍sAm|Eva|rasE̍na|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vai brahmavarcasaM̍ CandasAmEva̍ rasEna̍ rasaM̍ brahmavarcasamava# rundhE maitrAvaruṇIM dvirUpAmA̍ laBEta̍ vRuṣṭikAmO̍ maitraM ~MvA aharvAruṇI̍ rAtrirahOrAtrAByAM̍ Kalu vai parjanyO# vaṛṣati mitrAvaruṇAvEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tAvEvAsmA# ahOrAtrAByA̱M parjanyaM̍ ~Mvaṛṣayataḥ CandasAM̍ ~MvA Eṣa rasO yadvaśA rasa# iva Kalu vai vRuṣṭiḥ CandasAmEva̍ rasEna̍ - [ ] 43

verses.padam: (Padam) rasa̱m|vRuṣṭi̱m|avEti|rundhE|maitrAvaruṇImiti̍# maitrA - varuṇIm|dvirUpAmiti# dvi - rUpAm|Eti|laBEta|prajAkA̍ma̍ iti# prajA - kAmaḥ|maitram|vai|ahaḥ|vAruṇI|rAtri̍ḥ|ahOrAtrAByAmitya̍haḥ̍ - rAtrAByA̱m|Kalu|vai|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prEti|jAyantE|mitrAvaru̍ṇAviti̍# mitrA-varuṇau|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tau|Eva|asmai|ahOrAtrAByAmitya̍haḥ̍ - rAtrAByA̱m|prajAmiti# pra -jAm|prEti|janayataḥ|Canda̍sAm|vai|Eṣaḥ|rasa̍ḥ|yat|vaśA|rasa̍ḥ|iva|Kalu̍|vai|prajEti̍# pra-jA|CandasAm|Eva|rasE̍na|rasa̱m|prajAmiti̍# pra -jAm|avEti|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rasaM ~MvRuṣṭimava# rundhE maitrAvaruṇIM dvirUpAmA̍ laBEta̍ prajAkAmO̍ maitraM ~MvA aharvAruṇI̍ rAtrirahOrAtrAByAM̍ Kalu vai prajAḥ prajAyantE̍ mitrAvaruṇAvEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tAvEvAsmA# ahOrAtrAByA̱M prajAM prajanayataḥ̍ CandasAM̍ ~MvA Eṣa rasO yadvaśA rasa# iva Kalu vai prajA CandasAmEva̍ rasEna̍ rasaM̍ prajAmava# - [ ] 44

verses.padam: (Padam) rundhE|vaiśvadEvImiti# vaiśva - dEvIm|bahurUpAmiti# bahu - rUpAm|Eti|laBEta|anna̍kAma̍ ityanna# - kAmaḥ|vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva - dEvam|vai|anna̱m|viśvAn|Eva|dEvAn|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tE|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|prEti̍|yacCanti|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|Eva|Bavati|CandasAm|vai|Eṣaḥ|rasa̍ḥ|yat|vaśA|rasa̍ḥ|iva|Kalu̍|vai|anna̱m|Canda̍sAm|Eva|rasE̍na|rasa̱m|anna̱m|avEti̍|rundhE|vaiśvadEvImiti̍# vaiśva - dEvIm|bahurUpAmiti# bahu-rUpAm|Eti|laBEta|grAma̍kAma̍ iti grAma# - kAmaḥ|vaiśvadEvA iti# vaiśva - dEvAḥ|vai|45 (50)
verses.samhita: rundhE vaiśvadEvIM bahurUpAmA̍ laBEtAnna̍kAmO̍ vaiśvadEvaM ~MvA annaM ~MviśvAnEva̍ dEvAnth svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati ta EvAsmA annaM prayacCantyannAda̍ Eva Bavati̍ CandasAM̍ ~MvA Eṣa rasO yadvaśA rasa# iva Kalu vA annaM CandasAmEva̍ rasEna̍ rasamannamava# rundhE vaiśvadEvIM bahurUpAmA̍ laBEta̍ grAmakAmO̍ vaiśvadEvA vai - [ ] 45

verses.padam: (Padam) sajAtA iti# sa - jAtAḥ|viśvAn|Eva|dEvAn|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tE|Eva|asmai|sajAtAniti̍# sa-jAtAn|prEti|yacCanti|grAmI|Eva|Bavati|Canda̍sAm|vai|Eṣaḥ|rasa̍ḥ|yat|vaśA|rasa̍ḥ|iva|Kalu̍|vai|sajAtA̍ iti# sa - jAtAḥ|CandasAm|Eva|rasE̍na|rasa̱m|sajAtAniti̍# sa - jAtAn|avEti|rundhE|bAṛqhaspatyam|ukṣavaśamityu̍kṣa̍ - vaśam|Eti|laBEta|brahmavarcasakA̍ma̍ iti# brahmavarcasa - kAmaḥ|bRuhaspati̱m|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asminn|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|46 (50)
verses.samhita: sajAtA̍ viśvAnEva̍ dEvAnth svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati ta EvAsmai# sajAtAn pra yacCanti̍ grAmyEva̍ Bavati̍ CandasAM̍ ~MvA Eṣa rasO yadvaśA rasa# iva Kalu vai sajAtAḥ̍ CandasAmEva̍ rasEna̍ rasaṃ# sajAtAnava# rundhE bAṛhaspatya- mukṣavaśamA̍ laBEta̍ brahmavarcasakAmO̍ bRuhaspatimEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmin̍ brahmavarcasaM - [ ] 46

verses.padam: (Padam) dadhAti|brahmavarcasIti# brahma - varcasI|Eva|Bavati|vaśa̱m|vai|Eṣaḥ|carati|yat|ukṣA|vaśaḥ|iva|Kalu̍|vai|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|vaśEna|Eva|vaśa̱m|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|avEti|rundhE|raudrIm|rOhi̍ṇIm|Eti̍|laBEta|aBicarannitya̍Bi-caran̍|rudram|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tasmai̱|Eva|Enam|Eti̍|vRuścati|tAjak|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|rOhi̍ṇI|Bavati|raudrI|hi|EṣA|dEvata̍yA|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|sPyaḥ|yUpaḥ̍ ( )|Bavati|vajraḥ|vai|sPyaḥ|vajra̱m|Eva|asmai|prEti̍|harati|śaramayamiti̍# śara - maya̱m|barqḥiḥ|śRuṇAti|Eva|Enam|vaiBI̍dakaḥ|iddhmaḥ|Binatti̍|Eva|Enam||47̍ (69) (aBi - Kalu - vRuṣṭiḥ CandasAmEva̍ rasEna̍ - prajAmava# - vaiśvadEvA vai - brahmavarcasaM̍ - ~MyUpa - EkAnnaviṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: dadhAti̍ brahmavarcasyEva̍ Bavati̍ vaśaM ~MvA Eṣa carati̍ yadukṣAvaśa# iva Kalu vai brahmavarcasaM̍ ~MvaśEnaiva̍ vaśaM̍ brahmavarcasamava# rundhEraudrIṃrOhiṇImA̍ laBEtABicara̍n̍ rudramEva svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tasmA# EvainamA vRuścati̍ tAjagArtimArcCati̍ rOhiṇI̍ Bavati raudrI hyEṣA̍ dEvatayA̍ samRuddhyai̍ sPyO yUpO# ( ) Bavati vajrO vai sPyO vajramEvAsmai̍ pra harati̍ śaramayaM̍ barqḥiḥ śRuṇAtyEvainaM ~MvaiBIdaka̍ iddhmO BinattyEvaina̱M||47 (aBi - Kalu - vRuṣṭiḥ CandasAmEva̍ rasEna̍ - prajAmava# - vaiśvadEvA vai - brahmavarcasaM̍ - ~MyUpa - EkAnnaviṃśatiśca̍)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) asau|Adityaḥ|na|vIti|arOcata|tasmai̱|dEvAḥ|prAya̍ścittim|aicCann|tasmai̱|EtAm|saurIm|śvEtAm|vaśAm|Eti̍|alaBanta|tayA̱|Eva|asminn|ruca̱m|adadhuḥ|yaḥ|brahmavarcasakA̍ma̍ iti# brahmavarcasa - kAmaḥ|syAt|tasmai̱|EtAm|saurIm|śvEtAm|vaśAm|Eti|laBEta|amum|Eva|Adityam|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asminn|bahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|dadhAti|brahmavarcasIti# brahma - varcasI|Eva|Bavati|bailq.vaḥ|yUpaḥ|Bavati|asau|48̍ (50)
verses.samhita: asAvAdityO̍ na vyarOcata̍ tasmai# dEvAḥ prAyaścittimaicCan̍ tasmA# EtAṃ saurIṅ śvEtAM ~MvaśAmA&laBanta̍ tayaivAsmin rucamadadhuryO̍ brahmavarcasakA̍maḥ̍ syAt tasmA# EtAṃ saurIṅ śvEtAM ~MvaśAmA laBEtAmumEvA̍ &&*dityaṅ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmin̍ brahmavarcasaM dadhAti̍ brahmavarcasyEva̍ Bavati̍ bailq.vO yUpO# Bavatyasau- [ ] 48

verses.padam: (Padam) vai|Adityaḥ|yataḥ|ajA̍yata|tata̍ḥ|bilva̍ḥ|uditi̍|atiṣṭhat|sayOnIti̍ sa - yOni|Eva|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|avEti|rundhE|brAhmaṇaspatyAmiti̍# brAhmaṇaḥ - patyAm|baBrukarṇImiti# baBru - karṇIm|Eti|laBEta|aBicarannitya̍Bi̍ - caran|vAruṇam|daśa̍kapAlamiti̍ daśa# - kapAlam|purastA̱t|niriti|vapEt|varu̍ṇEna|Eva|BrAtRu̍vyam|grAhayitvA|brahma̍ṇA|stRuṇutE|baBrukarṇIti̍# baBru - karṇI|Bavati|Etat|vai|brahmaṇaḥ|rUpam|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM-Ruddhyai|sPyaḥ|yUpaḥ|Bavati|vajra̍ḥ|vai|sPyaḥ|vajra̱m|Eva|asmai|prEti̍|harati|śaramayamiti̍# śara - maya̱m|barqḥiḥ|śRuṇAti|49̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vA AdityO̍ yatO&jAyata̍ tatO# bilva# udatiṣṭhath̍ sayO̱nyEva brahmavarcasamava̍# rundhE brAhmaṇaspatyAM baBrukarṇImA̍ laBEtA-Bicara̍n.̍ vAruṇaM daśakapAlaM̍ purastAn-nirvapEd-varu̍ṇEnaiva̍ BrAtRuvyaM̍ grAhayitvA brahmaṇA̍ stRuṇutE baBrukarṇI BavatyEtadvai̍ brahmaṇO̍ rUpaṃ samRuddh^^yai̍ sPyO yUpO# Bavati vajrO vai sPyO vajramEvAsmai̍ pra harati̍ śaramayaM̍ barqḥiḥ śRuṇA - [ ] 49

verses.padam: (Padam) Eva|Enam|vaiBIdakaḥ|iddhmaḥ|Binatti̍|Eva|Enam|vaiṣṇavam|vAmanam|Eti̍|laBEta|yam|yajñaḥ|na|upanamEdityu̍pa-namE̱t|viṣṇu̍ḥ|vai|yajñaḥ|viṣṇu̱m|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|yajñam|prEti̍|yacCati|upEti̍|Enam|yajñaḥ|namati|vAmanaḥ|Bavati|vaiṣṇavaḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|dEvata̍yA|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|tvAṣṭram|vaḍabam|Eti|laBEta|paśukA̍ma̍ iti# paśu - kAmaḥ|tvaṣṭA̱|vai|paśUnAm|mithunAnA̱m|50 (50)
verses.samhita: -tyEvainaM ~MvaiBIdaka̍ iddhmO BinattyEvainaM̍ ~MvaiṣṇavaM ~MvAmanamA̍ laBEta̍ yaM ~MyajñO nOpanamEd-viṣṇurvai yajñO viṣṇumEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai# yajñaM pra yacCatyupai̍naM̍ ~MyajñO namati̍ vAmanO Bavati̍ vaiṣṇavO hyEṣa̍ dEvatayA̍ samRuddhyai̍ tvAṣṭraM ~MvaḍabamA̍ laBEta̍ paśukAmastvaṣṭA̍ vai paśUnAM̍ mithunAnA̱M̍ - [ ] 50

verses.padam: (Padam) prajanayitEti# pra - janayitA|tvaṣṭAram|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|paśUn|mithunAn|prEti̍|janayati|prajEti̍# pra - jA|hi|vai|Etasminn|paśava̍ḥ|pravi̍ṣṭA̍ iti pra - viṣṭAḥ|atha|Eṣaḥ|pumAn̍|sann|vaḍabaḥ|sAkṣAditi̍# sa - akṣAt|Eva|prajAmiti# pra -jAm|paśUn|avEti|rundhE|maitram|śvEtam|Eti̍|laBEta|sa~ggrAma̍ iti# saM - grAmE|saM~Myatta̍ iti saM - yattE|samayakAma̍ iti# samaya - kAmaḥ|mitram|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|Enam|mitrEṇa̍|samiti̍|nayati|51̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajanayitA tvaṣṭAramEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai# paśUn mithunAn̍ pra janayati̍ prajA hi vA Etasmin̍ paśavaḥ praviṣṭA̍ athaiṣa pumAnth^^san vaḍabaḥ̍ sAkṣAdEva prajAM paśUnava# rundhE maitraṅ śvEtamA laBEta̍ saMgrAmE saM~MyattE̍ samayakAmO̍ mitramEva svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvainaM̍ mitrEṇa saM nayati̍ - [ ] 51

verses.padam: (Padam) viśAla iti# vi - śAlaḥ|Bavati|vyavasAyayatIti̍# vi - avasAyayati|Eva|Enam|prAjApatyamiti̍# prAjA - patyam|kRuṣṇam|Eti|laBEta|vRuṣṭi̍kAma̍ iti vRuṣṭi# - kAmaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vai|vRuṣṭyA̱ḥ|IśE|prajApatimiti̍# prajA - patim|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|parjanya̱m|varq.ṣayati|kRuṣṇaḥ|Bavati|Etat|vai|vRuṣ^^ṭyai̱|rUpam|rUpEṇa̍|Eva|vRuṣṭi̱m|avEti̍|rundhE|śabala̍ḥ|Bavati|vidyutamiti̍# vi - dyuta̱m|Eva|asmai|janayitvA|vaṛqṣayata|avAśRu~ggaḥ|Bavati|vRuṣṭi̱m|Eva|asmai|nIti|yacCati̍ ( )||52 (50)
verses.samhita: viśAlO Bavati̍ vyavasAyayatyEvaina̍M̍ prAjApatyaM kRuṣṇamA laBEta̍ vRuṣṭikAmaḥ̍ prajApatirvai̍ vRuṣ^^ṭyA# IśE prajApatimEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai# parjanyaM̍ ~Mvaṛṣayati kRuṣṇO BavatyEtadvai̍ vRuṣ^^ṭyai# rUpaṃ rUpEṇaiva vRuṣṭimava# rundhE śabalO# Bavati vidyutamEvAsmai̍# janayitvA vaṛṣayatyavAśRu~ggO̍ Bavati̍ vRuṣṭimEvAsmai̍ ni yacCati̍ ( )||52

verses.padam: (Padam) varuṇam|suṣuvAṇam|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|na|upEti|anamat|saḥ|EtAm|vAruṇIm|kRuṣṇAm|vaśAm|apaśyat|tAm|svAyai̱|dEvatA̍yai|Eti̍|alaBata|tata̍ḥ|vai|tam|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|upEti|anamat|yam|ala̱m|annAdyAyEtya̍nna̍ - adyAya|santa̱m|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|na|upanamEdityupa-namE̱t|saḥ|EtAm|vAruṇIm|kRuṣṇAm|vaśAm|Eti̍|laBEta|varu̍ṇam|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|prEti̍|yacCati|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|53 (50)
verses.samhita: varuṇaṃ̍ suṣuvAṇamannAdyaM nOpAnamath̍ sa EtAM ~MvAruṇIM̍ kRuṣṇAM ~MvaśAmapaśyat̍ tAṅ svAyai# dEvatAyA̍ AlaBata̍ tatO vai tamannAd-yamupAnamad-yamala̍mannAdyA̍ya̍ santamannAdyaM̍ nOpanamEth sa EtAM ~MvAruṇIM̍ kRuṣṇAM ~MvaśAmA laBEta̍ varuṇamEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmA annaM pra yacCatyannAda̍ - [ ] 53

verses.padam: (Padam) Eva|Bavati|kRuṣṇA|Bavati|vAruṇI|hi|EṣA|dEvatayA|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|maitram|śvEtam|Eti|laBEta|vAruṇam|kRuṣṇam|apAm|ca|Oṣa̍dhInAm|ca|sadhAMviti̍# saM - dhau|annakAma̍ ityanna# - kAmaḥ|maitrIḥ|vai|Oṣadhayaḥ|vAruṇIḥ|Apa̍ḥ|apAm|ca|Kalu̍|vai|Oṣa̍dhInAm|ca|rasa̱m|upEti̍|jIvAmaḥ|mitrAvaru̍ṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tau|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|prEti̍|yacCataḥ|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|Eva|Bavati|54 (50)
verses.samhita: Eva Bavati̍ kRuṣṇA Bavati̍ vAruṇI hyEṣA̍ dEvatayA̍ samRuddhyai̍ maitraṅ śvEtamA laBEta̍ vAruṇaM kRuṣṇamapAM cauṣadhInAM̍ ca sadhAMvannakAmO̍ maitrIrvA OṣadhayO̍ vAruṇIrApO&pAM ca Kalu vA OṣadhInAM̍ ca rasamupa# jIvAmO mitrAvaruṇAvEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tAvEvAsmA annaM prayacCatO&nnAda̍ Eva Bava̍ - [ ] 54

verses.padam: (Padam) apAm|ca|OṣadhInAm|ca|sadhAMviti̍# saM-dhau|Eti|laBatE|uBaya̍sya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - rudhyai|viśAKa̍ iti vi-śAKaḥ|yUpaḥ|Bavati|dvE̍ iti|hi|EtE̍ iti|dEvatE̍ iti|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|maitram|śvEtam|Eti|laBEta|vAruṇam|kRuṣṇam|jyOgA̍mayAvIti̍ jyOk - AmayAvI|yat|maitraḥ|Bavati|mitrEṇa̍|Eva|asmai|varu̍ṇam|śamayati|yat|vAruṇaḥ|sAkṣAditi̍# sa - akṣAt|Eva|Enam|varuṇapAśAditi# varuṇa - pAśAt|mu~jcati|uta|yadi|itAsuritIta-asuḥ|Bava̍ti|jIva̍ti|Eva|dEvAḥ|vai|puṣṭi̱m|na|avindann|55̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tyapAM cauṣadhInAM̍ ca sadhAMvA laBata̍ uBayasyA-varuddhyaiviśA̍KO̍ yUpO# Bavati dvE hyEtE̍ dEvatE samRuddhyai̍ maitraṅ śvEtamA laBEta̍ vAruṇaM kRuṣṇaM jyOgAmayAvIyan̍ maitrO Bavati̍ mitrEṇaivAsmai varuṇaṃ̍ śamayati yad-vAruṇaḥ̍ sAkṣAdEvainaM̍ ~MvaruṇapAśAn mu~jcatyuta̍ yadItAsurBavati̍ jIvatyEva̍ dEvA vai puṣṭiM nAvindan̍ - [ ] 55

verses.padam: (Padam) tAm|mithunE|apaśyann|tasyA̱m|na|samiti|arAdhayann|tau|aśvinau̱|abrUtAm|AvayO̱ḥ|vai|EṣA|mA|EtasyA̱m|vadaddhvam|iti̍|sA|aśvinO̱ḥ|Eva|aBavat|yaḥ|puṣṭi̍kAma̍ iti puṣṭi# - kAmaḥ|syAt|saḥ|EtAm|AśvinIm|yamIm|vaśAm|Eti|laBEta|aśvinau̱|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tau|Eva|asminn|puṣṭi̱m|dhattaḥ|puṣya̍ti|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ||56 (45) (annAdO̱ - &nnAda Eva Bavatya̍ - vindan - pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: tAM mithunE̍# &paśyan tasyAM na samarAdhayantA-vaśvinA̍-vabrUtA-mAvayOrvA̍ EṣA maitasyAM̱ ~Mvadaddhvamiti sAśvinOrEvABa̍vadyaḥ̍ puṣṭikAmaḥ̍ syAth sa EtAmA̱śvinIM ~MyamIM ~MvaśAmA laBEtA&śvinA̍vEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tAvEvAsmin puṣṭiM̍ dhattaḥ puṣyati̍ prajayA# paśuBiḥ||56̍ (annAdO̱ - &nnAda Eva Bavatya̍ - vindan - pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) Aśvinam|dhUmralalAmamiti̍# dhUmra - lalAmam|Eti|laBEta|yaḥ|durbrA̱hmaṇa̍ iti duḥ - brAhmaṇaḥ|sOma̱m|pipAsEt|aśvinau̱|vai|dEvAnA̱m|asO̍mapAvityasO̍ma̍ - pau|AstAm|tau|paścA|sOmapIthamiti# sOma - pItham|prEti|ApnutAm|aśvinau̱|Etasya̍|dEvatA̱|yaḥ|durbrA̱hmaṇa̍ iti duḥ- brAhmaṇaḥ|sOma̱m|pipAsati|aśvinau̱|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tau|Eva|asmai|sOmapIthamiti̍# sOma-pItham|prEti|yacCataḥ|upEti̍|Enam|sOmapItha̍ iti# sOma - pIthaḥ|namati|yat|dhUmraḥ|Bavati|dhUmrimAṇa̱m|Eva|asmAt|apEti̍|hanti|lalAma̍ḥ|57̍ (50)
verses.samhita: AśvinaM dhUmralalAmamA̍ laBEta̍ yO durbrA̱hmaṇaḥ sOmaM pipAsEdaśvinau̍ vai dEvAnA-masOmapAvAstAM̍ tau paścA sOmapIthaM̍ prApnutA-maśvinA̍vEtasya̍# dEvatA yO durbrA̱hmaṇaḥ sOmaM pipAsatyaśvinA̍vEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvatitAvEvAsmai# sOmapIthaM pra yacCata̍ upainaṃ̍ sOmapIthO namati̍ yad-dhUmrO Bavati̍ dhUmrimAṇa-mEvAsmAdapa̍# hanti lalAmO# - [ ] 57

verses.padam: (Padam) Bavati|muKataḥ|Eva|asminn|tEjaḥ|dadhAti|vAyavya̱m|gOmRugamiti̍# gO - mRugam|Eti|laBEta|yam|aja̍GnivAṃsam|aBiśaṃsE̍yuritya̍Bi̍ - śaṃsEyuḥ|apU̍tA|vai|Etam|vAk|RucCati|yam|aja̍GnivAṃsam|aBiśaṃsantItya̍Bi̍ - śaṃsanti|na|Eṣaḥ|grAmyaḥ|paśuḥ|na|Araṇyaḥ|yat|gOmRuga̍ iti# gO - mRugaḥ|na|iva|Eṣaḥ|grAmE̱|na|araṇyE|yam|aja̍GnivAṃsam|aBiśaṃsantItya̍Bi-śaṃsa̍nti|vAyuḥ|vai|dEvAnA̱m|pavitra̱m|vAyum|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|58̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Bavati muKata EvAsmin tEjO# dadhAti vAyavyaM̍ gOmRugamA laBEta̍ yamajaGnivAṃ̍ samaBiśaṃ sEyurapU̍tA̍ vA EtaM ~MvAgRucCati̍ yamajaGnivAṃ̍ samaBiśaṃ santi̍ naiṣa grAmyaḥ paśurnAraṇyO yad-gOmRugO̍ nEvaiṣa grAmE nAraṇyE̍ yamajaGnivAṃ̍ samaBiśaṃ santi̍ vAyurvai dEvAnA̱M pavitraM̍ ~MvAyumEva svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa Evai - [ ] 58

verses.padam: (Padam) Enam|pavayati|parAcI|vai|Etasmai̱|vyucCantIti̍# vi-ucCantI̱|vIti|ucCati|tama̍ḥ|pApmAna̱m|prEti̍|viśati|yasya̍|AśvinE|śasyamA̍nE|sUrya̍ḥ|na|Aviḥ|Bava̍ti|sauryam|bahurUpamiti̍# bahu - rUpam|Eti|laBEta|amum|Eva|Adityam|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmAt|tama̍ḥ|pApmAna̱m|apEti̍|hanti|pratIcI̱|asmai|vyucCantIti̍# vi - ucCantI̱|vIti|ucCati|apEti̍|tama̍ḥ|pApmAna̱m|hatE||59̍ (46) (lalAmaḥ - sa Eva - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: -naM̍ pavayati parAcI̍ vA Etasmai̱ vyucCantI vyucCati̍ tamaḥ̍ pApmAnaM praviśati̍ yasyA̱śvinE śasyamAnE̍ sUryO nA*&&virBavati̍ sauryaM bahurUpamA̍ laBEtAmumEvAdityaṅ̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmAt tamaḥ̍ pApmAnamapa# hanti pratIcyasmai̍ vyucCantI vyucCatyapa̍ tamaḥ̍ pApmAnaṃ# hatE||59 (lalAmaḥ - sa Eva - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) indra̱m|vaḥ|viśvataḥ|parIti̍|indra̱m|nara̍ḥ|maru̍taḥ|yat|ha|vaḥ|divaḥ|yA|vaḥ|śarma̍||BarE̍ṣu|indra̱m|suhavamiti̍# su - hava̱m|havAmahE|aṃqhOmucamityaṃhaḥ̍ - muca̱m|sukRutamiti# su - kRuta̱m|daivya̱m|jana̱m||agnim|mitram|varuṇam|sAtayE̱|Baga̱m|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|marutaḥ|svastayE̱||mamattu̍|naḥ|parijmEti̍ pari-jmA|vasarqḥA|mamattu̍|vAta̍ḥ|apAm|vRuṣa̍ṇvAniti̍ vRuṣaṇa# - vAn||śiśItam|indrAparvatEtI̱ndrA - parvatA|yuvam|naḥ|tat|naḥ|viśvE̱|varivasyantu|dEvAḥ||priyA|vaḥ|nAma|60̍ (50)
verses.samhita: - yA vaḥ śarma>4̍ yA vaḥ śarma# śaśamAnAya santi# tridhAtUni̍ dAśuṣE# yacCatAdhi|asmaByaM̍ tAni# marutO vi yanta̍ rayiM nO# dhatta vRuṣaṇaḥ suvIra̱M||

verses.padam: (Padam) huvE|turAṇA̱m||Eti|yat|tRupat|marutaḥ|vAvaśAnAḥ||śriyasE̱|kam|BAnuBiriti̍# BAnu-Biḥ|samiti|mimikṣirE|tE|raśmiBiriti̍# raśmi - Biḥ|tE|RukvaBirityRukva̍# - Biḥ|suKAdaya iti# su - KAdayaḥ||tE|vAśI̍manta̍ iti vAśi# - mantaḥ|iṣmiṇaḥ|aBI̍ravaḥ|vidrE|priyasya̍|mAru̍tasya|dhAmna̍ḥ||agniḥ|prathamaḥ|vasu̍Biriti̍ vasu-Biḥ|naḥ|avyAt|sOma̍ḥ|rudrEBi̍ḥ|aBIti̍|rakṣatu|tmanA̱||indra̍ḥ|marudBiriti̍# marut - Biḥ|RutudhEtyRutu̍ - dhA|kRuṇOtu|Adityaiḥ|naḥ|varuṇaḥ|samiti̍|śiśAtu||samiti̍|naḥ|dEvaḥ|vasu̍Biriti̍ vasu# - Biḥ|agniḥ|samiti|61̍ (50)
verses.samhita: huvE turAṇA̱M|A yat tRupanmarutO̍ vAvaśAnAḥ||śriyasE kaM BAnuBiḥ saM mimikṣirE̍ tE raśmiBista RukvaBiḥ̍ suKAdayaḥ|tE̍ vAśImanta̍ iṣmiṇO aBIravO̍ vidrE priyasya mArutasya̍ dhAmnaḥ||agniḥ̍ prathamO̍ vasuBirnO̍ avyAth sOmO# rudrEBiraBi̍ rakṣata̍ tmanA̱|indrO# marudBir̍ RutudhA kRuṇOtvAdityairnO̍ varuṇaḥ̍ saṃ śiśAtu||saM̍ nO# dEvO vasuBiragniḥ̍ saṃ - [ ] 61

verses.padam: (Padam) sOmaḥ|tanUBi̍ḥ|rudriyA̍Biḥ||samiti̍|indra̍ḥ|marudBiriti̍# marut - Biḥ|yajñiyai̱ḥ|samiti|Adityaiḥ|naḥ|varu̍ṇaḥ|ajijñipat||yathA̱|AdityAḥ|vasu̍Biriti̍ vasu# - Biḥ|sambaBUvuriti# saM - baBUvuḥ|marudBiriti# marut - Biḥ|rudrAḥ|samajAnatEti̍# saM - ajAnat|aBi||EvA|triṇAmanniti̍# tri - nAmann|ahRuṇIyamAnAḥ|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|sama̍nasa̍ iti sa - manasaḥ|Bavantu||kutra|citq|yasya̍|samRu̍tAviti̍ saM-Rutau|raṇvAḥ|naraḥ|nRuṣada̍na̍ iti# nRu-sadanE||aṛha̍ntaḥ|cit|yam|indhatE|sa~jjanayantIti̍# saM - janayanti|jantava̍ḥ||samiti̍|yat|iṣaḥ|vanA̍mahE|samiti̍|havyA|mAnu̍ṣAṇAm||uta|dyumnasya̍|śava̍saḥ|62̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sOmastanUBI̍# rudriyABiḥ|samindrO̍# marudBi# ryajñiyaiḥ samAdityairnO̍ varuṇO̍ ajijñipat||yathA&&dityA̍ vasuBiḥ̍ saMbaBUvurmarudBI# rudrAḥ samajAnatABi|EvA̍ triṇAmanna-hRu̍ṇIyamAnA̍ viśvE# dEvAḥ samanasO̍ Bavantu||kutrA# cidyasya samRutau̍ raṇvA narO# nRuṣadanE|aṛha̍ntaścid-yami̍ndhatE̍ sajaMqnaya̍nti̍ jantavaḥ||saM̍ ~MyadiṣO vanAmahE̍ saṃ havyA mAnuṣAṇAM|uta̍ dyumnasya śavasa̍ - [ ] 62

verses.padam: (Padam) Rutasya|raśmim|Eti̍|dadE||yajñaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|pratIti̍|Eti|sumnam|Adi̍tyAsaḥ|Bava̍ta|mRuḍayanta̍ḥ||Eti̍|vaḥ|arvAcI̱|sumatiriti̍# su - matiḥ|vavRutyAt|aṃqhOḥ|cit|yA|varivOvittarEti# varivOvit - tarA|asat||śuci̍ḥ|apaḥ|sUyava̍sA̍ iti# su - yavasAḥ|ada̍bdhaḥ|upEti̍|kṣEti|vRuddhava̍yA̍ iti# vRuddha - vayAḥ|suvIra iti# su - vIraḥ||naki̍ḥ|tam|Gnanti|anti̍taḥ|na|dUrAt|yaḥ|AdityAnA̱m|Bava̍ti|praṇI̍taviti̍ pra - nItau||dhArayantaḥ|AdityAsa̍ḥ|jaga̍t|sthAḥ|dEvAḥ|viśva̍sya|Buva̍nasya|gOpA̍ iti# gO-pAḥ||dIrGAdhiya̍ iti# dIrGa - dhiyaḥ|rakṣamAṇAḥ|63̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Rutasya# raśmimA dadE||yajñO̍ dEvAnAm pratyEti̍ sumnamAdityAsO̍ BavatA̍ mRuḍayantaḥ|A̍ vO&rvAcI# sumatirvavRutyAdaṃq̍ hOścidyA varivOvittarA&sa̍t||śuci̍rapaḥ̍ sUyavasA̍ adabdha̍ upa# kṣEti vRuddhavayAḥ̍ suvIraḥ|nakiṣṭaM̍ GnantyantitO̍ na dUrAdya AdityAnAM̍ Bavati̍ praṇItau||dhAraya̍nta̍ AdityAsO jagathsthA dEvA viśvasya̍ Buvanasya̍ gOpAḥ|dIrGAdhiyO̍ rakṣamAṇA-̍ [ ] 63

verses.padam: (Padam) asurya̱m|RutAvAna̍ ityRuta - vAnaḥ|cayamAnAḥ|RuṇAni̍||tisraḥ|BUmI̱ḥ|dhArayann|trIn|uta|dyUn|trIṇi̍|vratA|vidathE̱|antaḥ|EṣAm||RutEna̍|AdityAḥ|mahi̍|vaḥ|mahitvamiti̍# mahi - tvam|tat|aryamann|varuṇa|mitra|cAru||tyAn|nu|kṣatriyAn̍|ava̍ḥ|AdityAn|yAciṣAmahE||sumRuḍIkAniti̍# su - maḍIkAn|aBiṣṭayE||na|dakṣiṇA|vIti̍|cikitE|na|savyA|na|prAcIna̱m|AdityAḥ|na|uta|paścA||pAkyA̱|cit|vasavaḥ|dhIryA̱|cit|64̍ (50)
verses.samhita: asuryamRutAvA̍na-ścaya̍mAnA̍ RuṇAni||tisrO̍ BUmI̱rddhArayan trIṃ ruta dyUn trIṇi# vratA vidathE# antarEṣAM|RutEnA̍&&*dityA̍ mahi# vO mahitvaM tadaryaman̍ varuṇa mitra cAru||tyAnnu̍ kṣatriyAṃq ava# AdityAn. yAciṣAmahE|sumRuḍIkAṃ̍ aBiṣṭayE||na̍ dakṣiṇA̍ vicikitE̍ na savyA na prAcInamAdityA̍ nOta paścA|pAkyA# cidvasavO dhIryA# cid - [ ] 64

verses.padam: (Padam) yuṣmAnItaḥ|aBa̍yam|jyOti̍ḥ|aśyAm||AdityAnA̱m|ava̍sA|nUta̍nEna|sakṣImahi̍|śarma̍ṇA|śanta̍mEnEti̍ śaM - tamEna||anAgAstva ityanAgAḥ-tvE|adititva̍ ityaditi̍ - tvE|turAsaḥ|imam|yajñam|dadhatu|śrOṣa̍mAṇAḥ||imam|mE|varuṇa|śrudha|hava̱m|adya|ca|mRuḍaya||tvAm|avasyuḥ|Eti̍|cakE||tat|tvA|yAmi|brahma̍ṇA|vanda̍mAnaḥ|tat|Eti̍|śAstE|yaja̍mAnaḥ|havirBiriti̍# haviḥ - Biḥ||ahEḍamAnaḥ|varuṇa|iha|bOdhi|uru̍śaṃqsEtyuru̍# - śaṃqsa|mA|naḥ|Ayuḥ|prEti̍|mOṣIḥ||65̍ (49) (nAmA - &gniḥ saṃ - śavasO̍ - rakṣamAṇA̍ - dhIryAM̍ cidE - kAnna pa~jcAśacca̍)̍ (A11) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- (vAyavyaM̍ - prAjapatistA̍ varuṇaM̍ - dEvAsurA Eṣva# - sAvAdityO̍ daśaṛṣaBA-mindrO̍# valasya# - bAṛhaspatyaM - ~MvaṣaṭkArO̍# - &sausaurIM - ~Mvaruṇa̍ -mAśvina - mindraM̍ ~MvO nara - EkAdaśa)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (vAyavya# - mAgnEyIM kRuṣṇagrIvI̍ - masAvAdityO̍ - vA ahOrAtrAṇi̍# - vaṣaṭkAraḥ - prajanayitA̍ - huvE̍ turAṇAM - pa~jcaṣaṣṭiḥ̍ ) First and Last Padam of First Prasnam of Kandam 2:- (vAyavyaM̍ - pramOṣIḥ)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE dvitIyakAṇḍE prathamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||
verses.samhita: -yuṣmAnItO̍ aBayaM̍ jyOtiraśyAM||AdityAnAmava̍sA̍ nUtanEna̍ sakṣImahi śarmaṇA̍ śantamEna|anAgAstvE̍ adititvE̍ turAsa# imaM ~MyajñaM dadhatu̍ śrOṣamAṇAḥ||imaM̍ mE# varuṇa śrudhI havamadyA̍ ca# mRuḍaya|tvAmavasyurA̍ cakE||tattvA̍# yAmi brahmaṇA̍ vandamAna-stadA̍ śA̱stE yajamAnO̍ havirBiḥ|ahE̍ḍamAnO̍ varuṇEha bOddhyuruśaṃsa̍ mA na Ayuḥ pramOṣIḥ||65̍ (nAmA - &gniḥ saṃ - śavasO̍ - rakṣamAṇA̍ - dhIryAM̍ cidE - kAnna pa~jcAśacca̍)̍ (A11) praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- (vAyavyaM̍ - prAjapatistA̍ varuṇaM̍ - dEvAsurA Eṣva# - sAvAdityO̍ daśaṛṣaBA-mindrO̍# valasya# - bAṛhaspatyaM - ~MvaṣaṭkArO̍# - &sausaurIM - ~Mvaruṇa̍ -mAśvina - mindraM̍ ~MvO nara - EkAdaśa)̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (vAyavya# - mAgnEyIM kRuṣṇagrIvI̍ - masAvAdityO̍ - vA ahOrAtrAṇi̍# - vaṣaṭkAraḥ - prajanayitA̍ - huvE̍ turAṇAM - pa~jcaṣaṣṭiḥ̍ ) first and last padam of first praśnam of kAṇḍam 2:- (vAyavyaM̍ - pramOṣIḥ)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM dvitIyakAṇḍE prathamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||2.1.1 Appendix
